2a1(dza): @'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
2a2(dza): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi
2a3(dza): rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po/ dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su med
2a4(dza): pa'i bde ba chen po'i dbang brnyes pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
2b1(dza): chen po/ khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba
2b2(dza): chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs dang ldan pa/
2b3(dza): che mchog he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang //
2b4(dza): gsung dang / thugs dang / rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na
2b5(dza): gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so// gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i
3a1(dza): @##/ dbyings kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa dag na/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / rdo rje nam mkha'
3a2(dza): la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / 'jig par byed pa'i gsang ba chen po'i
3a3(dza): g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong khyab pa 'di lta ste/ snying
3a4(dza): po ye shes rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings ye shes rdo rje dang / me long ye shes rdo rje dang / so so kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /
3a5(dza): mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / bya ba nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang / rlung ye shes rdo rje dang /
3a6(dza): me ye shes rdo rje dang / chu ye shes rdo rje dang / sa ye shes rdo rje dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang / gzugs
3b1(dza): shes rdo rje dang / sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / dri ye shes rdo rje dang / ro ye shes rdo rje dang / reg ye shes rdo rje dang / sku ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung ye shes rdo rje dang /
3b2(dza): thugs ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang / kun tu bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung gi dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang /
3b3(dza): zhi ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / me tog gi ye shes rdo rje dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje
3b4(dza): dang dbang gi ye shes rdo rje dang / nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje ye shes rdo rje dang / 'gro ba 'dul ba ye shes rdo rje dang /
3b5(dza): gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / go cha ye shes rdo rje dang / yang dag par zab
3b6(dza): par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje da / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbang bskur ba ye
3b7(dza): shes rdo rje dang / pad+ma dmar po ye shes rdo rje dang / dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang / mchod pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i g.yog dang bcas
4a1(dza): pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod ces bya ba'i dbang mo la
4a2(dza): shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma rdo rje ye shes dang / rin chen dbyings phyug ma le shes rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang /
4a3(dza): las kyi dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'joms par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye
4a4(dza): shes rdo rje dang / 'dren par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'bigs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / sdigs byed
4a5(dza): ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / tshig byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / yan lag thams cad 'phrog byed ye shes rdo rje dang / ngag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jib byed ma ye shes rdo rje
4a6(dza): dang khrag la dga' ba ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / phan byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma ye shes rdo rje dang / zas sha rlon za ma mi
4a7(dza): shes rdo rje dang / srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang / seng ge ye shes rdo rje dang / stag
4b1(dza): shes rdo na dang / ri dgas ma shes rdo dang / phag ye shes rdo dang / sbrul shes rdo rje dang / khyi ye shes rdorje dang / byi la ye shes rdo rje dang / ra ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rog
4b2(dza): ye shes rdo rje dang / weye shes rdo rje dang / bya rgod ma ye shes rdo rje dang / sre mo ye shes rdo rje dang / mi'i keng rus dang / 'bru chen po'i ro dang / ri dgas dang / sha za dang /
4b3(dza): gzig dang / bong bru dang / rta dang / ma he dang / ba lang dang / 'ug pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed mtshan mo dang / rdo rje zas 'dren ma chen mo dang / de la sogs pa mtha'
4b4(dza): yas mchog/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs g.yog dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rigs ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes khro bo
4b5(dza): ye shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i 'phra man ma ye shes rdo rje dang / yang sprul ma chen mo ye shes rdo rje dang / bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po
4b6(dza): rnams sgra chen mo 'byin cing / nam mkha' dbyings rab 'byams chen po'i tshogs kyis mchod pa byed cing / bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod pa med par bzhugs so//
4b7(dza): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshig rdo rje gtong ba dba' ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
5a1(dza): rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rab tu rnam par rol pa sprul pa chen po'i gar dang / glu dang / gar dang / sil snyan dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang /
5a2(dza): dri dang / ro dang / reg pa'i bde ba chen po dang / 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rol pa la sogs pa'i reg pa bde ba la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul
5a3(dza): chen po 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa dang /
5a4(dza): sras par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa dang / myang bar byed pa dang / 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'phrog par byed pa dang / rtsom par byed pa dang / kun tu 'debs par byed pa dang /
5a5(dza): bde bar nye bar stobs shing reg pa'i bye brag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad med par nam mkha'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das pa mnyam par 'jog pas nye bar gnas shing 'tsho skyong ste/
5a6(dza): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ dgongs pa nye bar mi 'jog/ thabs dang shes rab gtong bar mi mdzad//
5a7(dza): shin tu 'gal ba log pa yang dag pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/ nye bar 'jog par mi mdzad/ ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar
5b1(dza): gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi par yang mi mdzad/ mA 'gag pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi
5b2(dza): mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar gyur pa rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar ma gyur pa rnams dga' bar yang mi mdzad/ mkhros
5b3(dza): pa khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi gdug pa gdug par yang mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen mo dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gtum po chen po dang / lha dang / lha ma yin dang /
5b4(dza): log 'dren dang / gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa chen po dang / tsha ba'i gdon dang / nad dang /
5b5(dza): sbrul dang / sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa'i rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
5b6(dza): cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar gzhag ste/ spyan gnyis mi 'dzums par gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la
5b7(dza): bskor zhing / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje sems
6a1(dza): dpa' sems dpa' spyan// rnam dag sras bcas byang chub rnams// yun rings sgoms nas shin tu gdungs// dga' ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzad//
6a2(dza): kye'adod chags dri med kun tu bzang po spyod pa ste// 'dod chags dam tshig la ni phye mdzad nas// dka' ba drug spyad shin tu gdungs pa yis// 'dod pa bde ba nyid kyis 'jog
6a3(dza): par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu// rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems ni rab phyung nas// rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni bskams pa la// dri med
6a4(dza): char gyis spyi bor dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pa// pad+ma'i gnas su rdo rje mdzod gtong bas// sna tshogs sems pa'i sems sman
6a5(dza): glag gyur pas// sbyor ba gzhan mi ma rtogs bshad du gsol// rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde ba byed pa'i mdzod// rdo rje pad+ma bca' ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzad de//
6a6(dza): rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab btud nas// thams cad bde ba'i sgrub pa nyid kyis mnyes par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
6a7(dza): pa thams cad kun tu dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs nges par bskul ba thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ brjid dang bcas par gar mdzad cing
6b1(dza): zhal 'dzum pa dang / 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan mdzes pas smin rings bskyod cing ba sgyur ba dang / pad+ma'i phyag gis g.yas g.yon gyi 'phreng ba'i
6b2(dza): tshul gyis sa'i ngos la zhabs 'phan cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskum pa dang / 'jog cing 'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad de/
6b3(dza): rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ snu
6b4(dza): tshogs dang / phra ba dang / sbom po dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / rgan pa dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod
6b5(dza): sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun
6b6(dza): tubazang pas rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas
6b7(dza): pas thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la spyi bos btud nas gsol ba btab pas/ bcom ldan kun gyi gsang chen rol po'i thig le 'di// gnyis med
7a1(dza): ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyis ma skyes pa// skyes dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i//
7a2(dza): 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i// mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o// thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas dang // nam mkha'i dri med 'dra ba yi// rgyal mtshan chen po
7a3(dza): bsgreng byas te// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung // pad+mo'i mchog ni dmar po mdog/ 'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che/ bde
7a4(dza): byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog/ la dang ar ni don dang ldan// yang dag mdzes pa'i 'gyings pa'i 'gros// sa tshogs ye shes bde ba che// byang chub thig le'i mchog
7a5(dza): nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje
7a6(dza): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom
7a7(dza): ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par mdzad do// oM AHhUM/ mi skye ye shes bde mchog rol la bsnams// sems
7b1(dza): dpa'i mchog nyid 'gog pa rnams las bslab// chags med kun tu mya ngan las 'das mdzad pa bzhengs shing bsnams// mchog tu gsang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol//
7b2(dza): byang chub skye gnas dbyings las gar dbang mdzod// sngon gyi nyon mongs brkam pas gzir ba yi// bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzod//
7b3(dza): de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dza ni la snyoms par zhugs nas
7b4(dza): rang gi gsang ba'i thig le 'di las shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i thig le'i dbus su
7b5(dza): rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas shing / ste dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ril dang / sems can thams cad
7b6(dza): la gsal bar byas nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te/ slar de nyid du sla ra log nas/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po gsang ba
7b7(dza): mchog gi thig pa 'dabus su bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer tshogs kyi 'phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa/ snying po des bskul ba ni
8a1(dza): gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu
8a2(dza): dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bsgrubs te/ rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mngon par byung bar gyur to// de la la la ni spyan paH
8a3(dza): lta bur bsgyur cing / smin ma dkyus rings sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za// rdo rje sems la
8a4(dza): dgyes mdzad cing // bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis// bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur// zhal bsgyur smin ma bsgyur ba yis// spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin
8a5(dza): tu gnon// sor mo rnams kyang rab tu bsgyur// rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // sems dpa' chel mnyes par mdzod// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// sku ni
8a6(dza): skad cig sprul pa yis// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur// zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu// dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing // dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam
8a7(dza): bsgyur ba// byang chub sems ni myang bar mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde ba'i bdag po chen po la// rin
8b1(dza): chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// rab tu dgyes gsal bde ba mi// pad+ma dmar la phye mdzad de// 'dod chags bral zhing rab tu bsgyur// pad+ma'i dra ba 'brel ba yi//
8b2(dza): pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs pa'i// bde ba che la mnyes par mdzad// bcom ldan pad+mo gnas par 'gyur// phyag gi sor mo rtse
8b3(dza): mo mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing // phyag sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis// glog bzhin 'phral dang spyi gtsug tu// mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod
8b4(dza): pas/ sna tshogs bde byed go tso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan
8b5(dza): 'das kun tu bzang po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gnas pa byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
8b6(dza): cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba/ thig le byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dkyil
8b7(dza): 'khor nyid kyi tshul gyis su// cho ga sbyor bas spro byas te// de dang 'thun par dkyil 'khor gdon// sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing // ji ltar yang dag brtag
9a1(dza): bar bya/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na// he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang // brtag par nus pa ma
9a2(dza): yi no// dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pas// snying ba phyug rgya sngags rigs kyis// lha yi sbyor ba rgyas btab pas// chog shes pas bri bar b+ha//
9a3(dza): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// thig gis yongs su 'khor bar btab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan// kun tu yongs su
9a4(dza): mu khyud bcas// phyi rim rdo rje rabs bskor// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka rigs bzhi he ru kas bskor/ gru bzhir shwa ri yum
9a5(dza): dang bcas/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug la ye shes khro bo bcu drug dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i khro bo pha bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la
9a6(dza): sprul pa'i 'phra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyir mi snam bu gcig la yang khro bo'i sprul pa bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la zhe sdang sprul pa bcu drug/ de'i phyi
9a7(dza): rim snam bu gcig la sman gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis/ de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi sku bsil dpag bsam gyi shing bzhi/ de'i rtsa ba na sman
9b1(dza): bdud rtsi lha mo re re/ gser gyi me tog gzhon nu re re/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas sku khrus mdzad pa re re/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang
9b2(dza): phyug ma las grub pa mgo brnyan ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod do// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor gyi dgod pa'i don gzung zhing bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni
9b3(dza): dbus nyid du// bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// zhabs brgyad lha chen pho mo mnan//
9b4(dza): glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// zhing chen g.yang gzhi yab bskor// sbrul nag chun pos dbu la brgyan// thod pa rlon pas se ral kha// stag lpags 'god
9b5(dza): chen sham thabs can// khrag dang zhag gi tshom bur bcas// bde gshegs rigs ni he ru ka/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ mi 'jigs sems can bzhi
9b6(dza): yi khri/ spug nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// yum chen khro mo gnam
9b7(dza): zhal ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir brgyad// che lugs gtso bo yab dang mthun// dbus kyi dbu gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su
10a1(dza): med pa'i sbyor tshul bzhin du bzhugs so// rigs kyi yum kun gtso bo yab dang 'thun pa'o// ye shes las grub pa'i khro bo rdo rje thogs med dang
10a2(dza): khro bo rdo rje mdung dang / khro bo rdo rje mi dpal dang / khro bo rdo rje mda' snyag dang / khro bo rdo rje phur bu dang / khro bo rdo rje tho ba dang / khro bo rdo rje bya kri dang khro bo rdorje
10a3(dza): rnon po dang / khro bo rdo rje ral gri dang / khro bo rdo rje zhags pa dang / khro bo rdo rje gtun khung 'dzin dang / khro bo rdo rje ral pa gcig pa dang / khro bo rdo rje ye shes dang
10a4(dza): khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang / khro bo rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin dang / khro bo rdo rje pad+ma'i bra kurta dang / khro bo ral gcig ma dang / khro bo rdo rje rtse mo dang / khro mo 'jigs
10a5(dza): su rung ma dang / khro mo mi thub rdo rje 'dul ma dang / khro mo bkra shis ma dang / khro mo dpal ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i 'phreng thogs ma dang / khro mo nor bdag mo dang /
10a6(dza): khro mo grags ma dang / khro mo grags chen mo dang / khro mo rin 'od ldan ma dang/ khro mo pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma dang / khro mo zas sbyin ma dang / khro mo bdud rtsi
10a7(dza): 'khyil ma dang / khro mo rdo rje dur khrod ma dang / sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te// sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o// sprul pa'i khro bo 'di dag kyang // sku mdog sgra
10b1(dza): tshogs su 'gyur ba'o// khro bo hUM ka ra dang / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo nI la dan+ta dang / khro bo ya man ta ka dang / khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang / khro bo hA ya
10b2(dza): grI ba dang / khro bo Ta ki rA dza dang / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo yak+Sha ma hA ba la dang / khro bo bdud kyi
10b3(dza): rgyal po dang / khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang / khro bo gom pa 'dor ba dngakhro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang / khro bo las thams cad pa dang / khro ba
10b4(dza): sprul pa 'phra man ma dang / rdo rje ke'u ridang / rdo rje tse'u ri dang / rdo rje bu mo ha dang / rdo rje be ta li dang / rdo rje pu ka si dang / rdo rje g+has mA ri dang / rdo rje
10b5(dza): shi na dang / rdo rje tsan d+ha li dang / rdo rje sing ha mu kha dang / rdo rje byA g+h+r-i mu kha dang / rdo rje sril mu kha dang / rdo rje shA na mu kha dang / rdo rje kri ta mu kha dang / rdo rje
10b6(dza): kang ka mu kha dang / rdo rje khA kha mu kha dang / rdo rje u lu ka mu khA dang / 'di rnams sku mdog gcig tu ma nges so// 'di kun zhing bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs so//
10b7(dza): bdud rtsi lha mo de rnams kyang // phyag mtshan rdo rje bum pa 'dzin// sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyi zla brtsegs pa'i
11a1(dza): gdan la/ sku'i sprul pa glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/ yang sbrul chen mo seng ge lham dral dang / stag lcam dral dang / lnga snyam
11a2(dza): dral dang / spyang mo lham dral dang / byi rgod ldum dral dang / kang ka ldum dral dang / bya rog lham dral dang / thug pa lcam dral dang / 'di dag kun kyang ye
11a3(dza): shes kyi sprul pa'o// pa wang yum sprul dang / zer mo lham dral dang / pha rog sum dral dang / sreg pa ldum dral dang / khwa tal+yAm drul dang / b+hi la snu
11a4(dza): dral dang spre'u sgyum dral dang / khyi rtsam dral dang / sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzadado// las grub pa'i dbang phyug mami y-i srin mo
11a5(dza): dmar ser shing chen tri shu g.yag mgo ma// tshangs ma dmar skya ban dmar rtse lnga sbrul mgo ma// khro mo khyab 'jug 'byung ba'i snying 'dren gzig gi mgo/ khyab 'jug
11a6(dza): dkar dmar dung dmar byi zhags sre mo mgo/ gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pha wang mgo/ dbang mo dmar skya bam chen khro chen dred kyi mgo/ dmar mo dung dra mar rgyu zhags
11a7(dza): dmar mo dom gyi mgo/ bdud rtsi sngon mo rin chen chu srin mgo/ zhi bsngo skya bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/ be con nag mo bam chen thod rlon khra yi mgo/ srin mo
11b1(dza): nag mo bam chen rgyu zhags wa yi mgo/ za byed nag mo bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/ dga' byed nag mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya rgod mgo/ khrag 'thung dmar mo
11b2(dza): rdo rje dbyug pa du 'ad ma ra rta yi mgo/ gcig pu dkar dmar nam mkha' lding gi mgo/ yid 'phrog dmar ser bzhis bsdus byi za khyi yi mgo/ grub mo dka ra da ma ra pad+ma byi rba
11b3(dza): pu shud mgo/ rlung mo dmar ser ro za rdo rje sha ba'i mgo/ gsod byed sngo ldang bam chen rje'u chung s+ya ka'i mgo/ me mo dmar sar me sreg myu 'dren sbyin bu'i mgo/ phag
11b4(dza): mo ljang nag lce sbyin rlon dmar phag gi mgo/ dmar mo ljang sngon bdud rtsi'i khrag 'thung khwa yi mgo/ sna chen ljang nag bam chen longs spyod pan glang mgo/ grub mo ljang ser
11b5(dza): bdud rtsi khan dmar sbrul gyi mgo/ phag mo lcags kyu pu tra rdo rje khu byug mgo/ ra ni ser mo rgyu zhags ra yi migo/ bum rna dmar mo lcags sgrog kun 'joms seng ge'i mgro/
11b6(dza): gsus 'dzin ser mo bdud rtsi dri chen gzig gi mgo/ sems can thams cad mchog dag dza// dgyes pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil
11b7(dza): 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gang gis chud par rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can mchog gis ston par bstan// de nyid sangs rgyas byang
12a1(dza): chub 'grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gcig tu 'dus nas rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs/ zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis/
12a2(dza): rjud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs par mdzad// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis// brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan// mdzes pa'i smin
12a3(dza): btsugs rnam bsgyur ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgya phyag mdzad pa'i// 'gro la skyabs mdzad rgyas btab 'gyur// dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la// bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu
12a4(dza): bskul// gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas par 'gyur// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// mchog tu dgyes
12a5(dza): 'i dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// rnam pa kun tu sgyu med rol cing chud mdzad pa'i// bdag cag gzungs dang bcas te rnam spyad 'gyur ba med pa
12a6(dza): yi// bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni// rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te// che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog dang ldan// bde spyod de la rol pa'i tshul bzhin
12a7(dza): mdze/ rdo rje ku ni drangs pa yis// shin tu srid pa myangan 'das// dpa' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dim byin gyis rdzabag/ de nas
12b1(dza): bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang bcas pas spyan ut+pal kha phye ba bzhin smin ma dang sku rnam par bsgyur/ mchog gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo skyes// rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la btsal bar
12b2(dza): mdzod/ bde la bsnams shing bde stobs hUM// bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par gsol// dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// ji ltar bzhugs pa'i
12b3(dza): gnas su bzhugs su gsol// ngo mtshar tshe 'di bde ba thob// pha rol phyin drug gang la mi brten par// mi skyed mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang rnam par ldan// bde ba chos/
12b4(dza): dbyings la gnas pa yi// rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje chung // byang chub sems kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i
12b5(dza): bde chen po// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i dbyangs
12b6(dza): kyis bstod pa/ pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyi tshogs 'jig rten gyi
12b7(dza): khams mang po bskal par rgyas pa'i sprin gyi mtsho snyed ma lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi rigs
13a1(dza): las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa dang / rin chen 'dzin dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang //
13a2(dza): rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad med par byed par 'dren pa dang /
13a3(dza): 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / grangs med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang /
13a4(dza): gzhan yang phyir rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che pad+ma las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i
13a5(dza): tshogs rnams la rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad ma dang / kun tu gnon pa dang / tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang / phyag gis
13a6(dza): gar mdzad ma dang / 'gying ba dang / kun tu rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byin gyis brlabs nas/ dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba
13a7(dza): dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa/ de nyid bdag ni mnyam gzhag dang // de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang // sngags
13b1(dza): dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das// yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa// 'dre na dang tshig
13b2(dza): lus yang dag 'das// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya'o// chos min chos ni rnam spyod pa// chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya// rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba
13b3(dza): yi/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam// chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra// rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags// 'di ni
13b4(dza): dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs med gzugs ni dri med pa'i// khams kun la ni 'jig byed pa'i// sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor
13b5(dza): zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yog dang bcas/ pho nya dang / pho nya ma dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang // yang
13b6(dza): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma rab dgyes dpa' bo mchog/ kye ma rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor
13b7(dza): chen mo tshogs mchog ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba rab tu zab// rdo rje spyod pa bla na med// 'jig rten gsum pa pade thob
14a1(dza): pa'i/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// pad+mo rin chen sna tshogs che// thabs kyi sbyor bar gar mdzad pa// rnam grangs sems kyi 'jig
14a2(dza): rten du// bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das la thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag/ sor mo'i 'dab ma kun tu 'brel//
14a3(dza): rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur// brjid bag dag tu rab tu bcas// grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan// chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du gzigs pas bshad// dbyangs
14a4(dza): ldan pa dang gcig la gcig bskul dang // snang zhing kun tu ma chags par// chags med bde ba mchog gis ni// bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzungs kyi rnams// stobs
14a5(dza): shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab ste// stobs shing bzhengs te grub par mdzod// chags pas rab tu mi gos pa'i// bde la
14a6(dza): reg cing dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas nyid kyis thugs sad par gyur te shin tu dgyes
14a7(dza): nas/ rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ shin tu dgyes pa'i dbyangs
14b1(dza): kyis mgur len cing rdo rje rnam par rol pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pas bzhad pa bzhad cing / nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs ka nas/ ma hA su khAn+du/
14b2(dza): zhes brjod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes kyi dbyings phyug ma 'di phyung ngo // zla gam steng du ldan pa yi// ye shes
14b3(dza): gnyis po ma lta bu// thig le'i mtshan du ldan byas pas// gsal ba'i ye shes rnal 'byor ma// A li kA li 'dren bya ba// ri mong dbus su brtags byas te// de yi mgo/
14b4(dza): yi mjug nyid du// khro bo gnyis po mchog dpa' bya// 'di ni btsun mo rab gsal ba'i// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i// dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kun// bsod
14b5(dza): nams kun gyis byin brlabs 'gyur// e li gnyis dbus ri mo bri// 'dren pa yang dag ldan pas te// stang du zla gam thig le dga'// mgo mjug tu yang gzhan yang bri//
14b6(dza): 'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste// rnal 'byor rin chen ma dbang sbyin// brtan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed// A li gnyis
14b7(dza): dang ldan byas te// tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad// dang po bskal pa chen po yi// tsheg drag pa dang bcas par bzhag/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la
15a1(dza): 'am gzhan yang rung // phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub bya dkyil 'khor sgrub byed na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dkyil
15a2(dza): 'khor dam pa rnams kyi mchog/ ye shes phyag rgya mngon gnas pa'i// 'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba'i// bris pa yis kyang khyab par 'gyur// kye ma ho bde ba ye
15a3(dza): shes che// 'di ni ye shes 'di la gnas// gnod byed pa ni rten byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir//
15a4(dza): 'di las rgya che gzhan med do// bsgrub pa po dang sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// che mchog he ru ka gsang ba// bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil
15a5(dza): 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyis mchog tu
15a6(dza): gsung ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes
15a7(dza): pa'i yid ches pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing / yang he ru ka'i sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o//
15b1(dza): bcom ldan 'das che mchog he rA ka zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o// de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskum
15b2(dza): gyis mi khyab pa na/ shin tu mi bsrun pa gdug pa nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa can thams cad la/ badz+ra dz+wa li'i sgra sna tshogs kyi 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs
15b3(dza): bzhi he ru ka dregs pa can tshar gcod pa'i phyir/ rak+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i phyir/ rak+Sha he ru ka ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa'i
15b4(dza): phyir byi shri he ru ka dam tshig las mi 'da' ba'i phyir/ sa ma ya he ru ka de las 'phros pas he ru ka stong rtsa brgyad/ sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cir yang sprul nas 'gro
15b5(dza): don mdzad do// kro d+hi shwa rI sku mdog sna tshogs pa'o// dbu dgu/ phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs bzhi/ phyag cha sna tshogs pa'o// zhabs brgyad rdo
15b6(dza): 'bar ba ma phung gi nang na he ru ka bzhi zhabs bzhis mnan pa/ badz+ra he ru ka/ pad+ma'i' thubs su 'phral ba'i spyan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs so// shin tu rngam pa'i khro
15b7(dza): mo dbu'i steng na/ he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo dbu brgyad mnan pa yang / dbus su dbu gyen du bltas pa'i zhal gyi nang du bcug nas gnyis su med par sbyor zhing /
16a1(dza): byang chub kyi sems kyi yum gyi sku la bstims/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rigs bzhi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyis su med par
16a2(dza): sbyor zhing / byang chub kyi sems 'bebs/ badz+ra dz+wa li'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yas par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnams rab tu skrag nas skyabs su gsol
16a3(dza): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me phung gis// bskal pa bas kyang bsreg mdzad cing // 'jigs pa'i tshul 'chang rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mangs bsgrub pa'i tshig
16a4(dza): sgrogs shing // phyag mangs 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang // 'jig rten rab tu spa gong na// khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang // /
16a5(dza): dgod dang gshe zhing za byed pa// 'bab pa'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa// khro chen khyod la skyabs su mchi// zhes ma dang /
16a6(dza): sring mo bu mo dang / chung ma slas 'di rnams phul nas skyabs su gsol lo// chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba dbang du bsdus te/ dam tshig dang ming
16a7(dza): btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi
16b1(dza): gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa ye shes kyi rgyal po sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rol pa 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni// gru bzhi sgo bzhi mu
16b2(dza): khyud bcas// thig gis yongs su bskor bar gdag/ dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dbus su pad+ma'i snying po la// bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ shar du
16b3(dza): badz+ra he ru ka/ lho ra ni rat+na he ru ka/ nu ba tu pad+mA he ru ka/ byang du kaR+Ya he ru ka/ sha ra lho ra rak+Sha he ru ka/ lho nu ba yak+Sha he ru ka/ nu ba byang byi sha he ruka//
16b4(dza): byang shar sa ma ya he ru ka/ bde gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod// de yi phyi rim rdo rje rabs skor// de yi phyi rim snam bu la// ye shes las las grub pa'i 'phra
16b5(dza): men bcu drug dgod// de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor// gshin rje 'joms dang stobs po che// rta mgrin dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// sgo bzhi dag tu rim
16b6(dza): bzhin no// sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang gyur te gcig tu ma nges so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid kyi sku dang /
16b7(dza): gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma he ru ka dbu lnga/ phyag bcu drug pa/ gshog pa rdo rjes bltams pa/ zhabs brgyad chas
17a1(dza): dang brgyan cing / 'phra men ma bcu drug gi 'khor dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor te bzhugs pa/ de'i sprul pa las
17a2(dza): bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen po rak+ta dang rus gong gsar rnying gi nang na/ thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du zhing bsnol ba'i gdan khri la bzhugs so//
17a3(dza): dbu gsum/ phyag drug/ zhabs bzhi pa/ klu chen rnams brdzis pa/ rdo rje brag ris gtams pa/ rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ dbu
17a4(dza): gtsug nas rta mgo ljang khu lnga byung ba/ sbrul nag gi chun po/ stag lpags kyi sha ma thabs bgos pa/ zod pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ zhing bsnol ma'i khri la
17a5(dza): bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das na mchog chags pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hUM nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing khams nas// de nyid rang snang
17a6(dza): mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor na// bde ba chen po 'bar ba'i mchog gi lha// 'du 'bral med pa thugs rje dbang gi lha// dbang mchog ngo mtshar rnga ma brjid dbang gi lha/
17a7(dza): dpal chen pad+ma'i thugs ni rin po che// khro bor ston kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs can// mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs cir 'gyur yang // 'gro ba'i don du dpal chen
17b1(dza): bzhengs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin de nyid/ yul la ma chags brag phug dgon pa/ zas lam chags rtswa'i rtsa ba/ gos
17b2(dza): la ma chags shing gi shun pa/ skom la ma chags brag gi thigs pa/ brag la mi rten shing la rten/ shing mi rten chu la rten/ chu'i snying po 'tsher ba gcig tu sprul nas
17b3(dza): 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// ha ya gri ba nA mchog dpal// sku mdog dmar po stag gi sha ma thabs can// sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid chags pas// dbu
17b4(dza): yi gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni// dbu skra kham nag ral pa mun dza cod pa ma can// dbu yi gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa// smin mtshams
17b5(dza): sna brag kun nas glog stong 'phro// dbu yi gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bskyed nas ni// snyan nas sgra byung 'brug skad ldir// spyan nas ma byung khams gsum
17b6(dza): bsreg/ shangs nas rlung byung 'jig rten 'thor// zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// ma mo dam can rnams kyang dam la 'du// rta skad thang gsum
17b7(dza): 'tsher rabs srid gsum dbang du sdud// rta bro thang gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis mnan// pad+ma'i rgyal po rta mchog dpal// dkar mo'i mdog la dmar mo'i
18a1(dza): zhal/ sku mdog mthing kha'i khro gnyer can// snyan ni dung gi khong se can// mu med khams na ci mchis gsan// spyan gnyis nyi zla'i
18a2(dza): phrugs su bcas// khams gsum dag na ci mchis gzigs// rdog ma mtshon gyi lcang lo can// rnga ma lcags kyi g.yab mo 'debs// shangs nas me phyung
18a3(dza): 'bar ba'i 'tshub ma 'thor// zhal nas mi bzad lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// g.yas pa gsum po ba dan 'phyar// g.yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo bsgreng //
18a4(dza): ke'u rig shog pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis// na ba rnams ni sos par byed// shi bi rnams ni slong bar byed// rta skad bzhad la rta bro rdung // rta skad chen po thang cig
18a5(dza): gis/ klu rgyal rigs drug dbang du sdud// rta skad chen po thang cig gis// ma tshogs dbang phyug dbang du sdud// rta skad chen po thang cig gis// bgegs kyi
18a6(dza): tshogs rnams dbang du sdud// rta blo thang gsum brdungs pa yis// bdud bzhi kun kyang zil gyis gnon// dpag tshad 'og na bdud gnas pa// klad du rgyob
18a7(dza): la thal bar rlog/ yab gcig ri byams rta mchog dbang // rta kun tshul du gar byed kyi// gar gyi brdal da tshur spyon// rta kun tshul du dbyug 'dor gyi//
18b1(dza): dbyug pa'i brda la da tshur spyon// rta kun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyi// g.yab mo brdzal da tshur spyon// hom gyis rgyu drug rtsad nas gcod// 'phrin las zhi bar mdzod
18b2(dza): cig rta mchog dbang // srid gsum 'gran zla med pa rgyal ba nga yi mthu// che btsan kun la 'phags pa sra pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug che// gar mkhan sgyu 'phrul kun+da las
18b3(dza): thabs kyi rgyal por grags// byams ldan gar gyi dbang gi 'phrin las mdzod// rtag tu grub mchog re zhing 'bod 'grogs na// byams ldan mgon po bdag la ci phyir
18b4(dza): thugs mi brtse// lha mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na// ye shes lha mchog khyed kyi thugs rjes rung lags sam// dngos grub stsol bar mi dmigs
18b5(dza): kyang / sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsal// yum chen A ka dza ti mA ral pa gcig mas de skad bskul lo// yang yab kyis bskul ba/ khyad par bstan
18b6(dza): pa'i rnal 'byor ma// bdud kyi yum la gshin rje'i lcam// 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// dpal ldan chen mo re mA ti// mchen e kA dza ti ma// glu
18b7(dza): rgyagya gsang chen ral gcig ma// rak+ta chen mo dza mun tra// srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs// dpal ldan rdo rje d+harma shan ting dang // nam mkha'i khams kyi rnam
19a1(dza): rgyal dpal// yi dam rgyal mo g.yu 'phreng ma// las la 'khril cing chos la brtan// dbu rnams 'byor zhing 'dud pa'i tshul/
19a2(dza): gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// de nas snying po dz+nyAn tsam gyis// pad+ma ta krid ta ya grI ba hu lu hu lu hUM/ e A ra li/ b+h+ring rdzing trI / yu~M ka dzi tis ma ya
19a3(dza): s+t+waM/ ru lu ru lu hU b+h+yo hUM/ sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// dbyings gsum rnam par dag pa sgrubs// de nas skyo nas bsdu ba ni// hUM hUM zhes ni rab brjod de//
19a4(dza): phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni// sang ha ra na hUM zhes rab tu brjod// yab kyang yum la bsdu/ yum yang chos kyi dbyings su bsdu'o// bcom ldan
19a5(dza): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// cha ni bcu gnyis tshad du
19a6(dza): bya/ dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni/ dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta mgrin dbu gsum phyag
19a7(dza): drug la/ shar gyi 'dab ma la badz+ra he ru ka/ lho ra ra da na ha ru ka/ nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ byang du karma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhi yum bzhi/ de'i phyi ri ma du ke'u ri
19b1(dza): brgyad dang / sing ha ma brgyad dang / bcu drug sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o// sgo bzhi rim bzhi dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mthun// de nas bcom
19b2(dza): ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid rab tu gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// za byed chen po tshogs kyi bdag/ yon
19b3(dza): tan 'phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje shugs can dang / rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo
19b4(dza): gsus po dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje gad rgyangs can dang / rdo rje grags chen dang / rdo rje ha ha gad ma can dang / rdo rje he he grags can dngardo rje bgegs
19b5(dza): gnon pa'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje gshin rje gshed po can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje 'gyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po
19b6(dza): che dang / rdo rje ko brlon pa can dang / rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi bzang ba dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje so'i 'phreng ba
19b7(dza): can dang / rdo rje dung can dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje g.yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang / rdo rje hUM
20a1(dza): rten dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhu dang / rdo rje rang gri dang / rdo rdo rje dang / rdo rje g.yul zlog pa dang / rdo rje'abar
20a2(dza): dang rdo rjes drung / rdo rje mu dang / rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje rlud dang/ rdo rje nam mkha' dang / dzA rje yang dag pa dang / rdo rje dag 'bar ba dang / rdo rje 'bebs
20a3(dza): ba dang / rdo rje mig brgya pa dang / rdo rje bcu can dang / rdo rjesen mo skyes pa dang / rdo rje zungs kyi pags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang /
20a4(dza): rdorje su rmi can dang / rdo rje pags pa mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje 'phreng po thogs pa dang / rgyun dang / rdo rje rnon po dang dz+haiM ki lA ya dang / rdo rje pal
20a5(dza): dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje za byed dang / rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / rdo rje chen po dang / rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang /
20a6(dza): rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje skyes mchog dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / rdo rje kun tu blta ba dang / rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od bzang dang /
20a7(dza): rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje sku dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje thugs dang / rdo rje 'od gsal ba dang / rdo rje sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang /
20b1(dza): rmya ston pa dang / dza rnal 'byor chen po dang / d+hA chen kun bdag dang / rdod+ha'achang ba po da / rna kyim dang / rdo snang ba dang / do zla pa dang /
20b2(dza): rdo rje dri ma med pa dang / rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang / rdo rje skyil krung dang / rdo rje 'od po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma skyes dang / rdo rje thams cad kun mkhyen dang / rdo rje
20b3(dza): mdzod 'dzin dang / rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdorje rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje nu ma can gyi tshogs dang /
20b4(dza): rdo rje sngar mo can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul
20b5(dza): pa'i sku dang / rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba po dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyed pa dang / rdo rje don byed pa po dang / rdo rje lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje lha min bdag po
20b6(dza): dang rdo rje 'chi med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'joms par byed pa dang / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams pa dang / rdo rje shes rab rnon po dang /
20b7(dza): rdo rje thog thog lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje thib thib myos par byed pa dang / rdo rje'u ra'u ma 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / rdo rje chem chem gnam lcags
21a1(dza): 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam glog 'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum skul ba dang / rdo rje lce shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje mi srung
21a2(dza): smyo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje la t+ta rgyal bar byed pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shrIng sdungs par byed pa dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / rdo rje gnod
21a3(dza): sbyin srog gtsang pa dang / rdo rje zag 'thung snying zhag pa dang / rdo rje mi dpal snyed sreg bya dang / rdo rje mdung buba'i bigs par byed pa dang rdo rje zag
21a4(dza): za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje chel za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkang za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sha za bar byed pa dang / ye shes las sprul pa'i khro bo 'di
21a5(dza): rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/ zhal du 'dren par byed/ mkha' rlog par byed/ zhal du rngub cing za bar byed/ dbang du sdud cing tshar gcod par byed//
21a6(dza): tho bas rgyag par byed/ phu ra bus 'debs par byed/ ral gris gcod par byed/ be con gyis rdung bar byed/ 'khor los lus gtub par byed/ dgra
21a7(dza): stas gtub par byed/ rdo rjes mgo mjug med par rjeg par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis lus phye tshal du byed/ rdo rje'i mdas gting 'bigs par byed/
21b1(dza): mtshon spu gri ka mas lus gshag cing dral bar byed/ lcags kyus 'gugs par byed/ zhags pas 'ching bar byed/ lcags sgrog gis sdom par byed/
21b2(dza): rdo rje rgya gram phyed kyis dbang du bsdus nas las thams rgyud grub par byed do// rdo rje mtshon cha'i sngags so// oM byi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dz+wa la/ man Da la phaT phaT/
21b3(dza): ha lA ha lA hUM/ badz+ra dzA man tra su ma b+ha ni/ oM bruM hUM bruM traM bruM hri bruM ha bruM/ hUM hU hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ grangs nges par 'dir bstan
21b4(dza): to// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ de skad ces rdo rje mtshon cha'i char 'bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po sku
21b5(dza): dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las tsha bsgrub pa 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni// chag ni dgu yi tshad du bya// thig gis
21b6(dza): yongs su 'khor bar gdab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// 'khor lo dag gi lte ba la// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po bri// shar tu rdo rje sems
21b7(dza): dpa' bri// lhor ni rin chen 'byung ldan bri// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas bri// byang du don yod grub pa bri// phyi rim rdo rje rabs bskor// grwa bzhir dgod
22a1(dza): pa nishar du rdo rje dbyings phyug bri// lhor ni rin chen dbyings phyug bri// nub tu pad+mo dbyings phyug bri// byang du las kyi dbyings
22a2(dza): phyug bri/ de yi phyi rim snam bu la// sgo bzhi khyud dang bcas par dgod// sgo bzhi ni dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mthun// de dag rnams kyang phyag mtshan tshe'i bum pa re re 'dzin /
22a3(dza): cing bsnams pa/ gud na pad+ma la bzhugs pa sha stag go/ de nas tshe dgug par bya ba dang / tsheg shin rje nag po'i lag nas 'phrog pa dang /
22a4(dza): gang g.yab pa dang / tshe bcing zhing bsdam pa dang / tshe dbang du bsdu ba dang / tshe yongs su sbrel ba dang / tsha rgyas par bya bu dang / tshe rings zhing
22a5(dza): bdud kyis bar mi chod par bya ba dang / tshe sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi dngos grub thob par bya ba dang / tshe skye shi med pa'i 'bras bu'i chos
22a6(dza): lhun gyis grub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ lha mo lcags kyu thogs pa grangs med pa spros nas/ oM bruM badz+ra A yu she hUM dza/
22a7(dza): zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bdud gshin rje nag po snying dral te/ sho khog skya mo rlung gi btab pa bzhin/ dun du na khyar khyur 'ong ba de la gshin rje'i rtsarta
22b1(dza): nas bzung nas 'brad kyis 'gyel te/ rdo rje snying khar bzhag nas lag pa nas hur gyis phrogs nas/ tshe'i g.yab dar dang phyag rgyas g.yabs pas/ ri rab rtse la spras
22b2(dza): pa rgya mtsho'i gting du sbas pa/ bar snang gi khams la sbas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og bcu nas bkug cing blangs te/ zhags pa'i
22b3(dza): tshogs kyis bcings/ lcags sgrog gi tshogs kyis bsdams nas dbang du bsdus te/ rgya cher yongs su spel bar bya'o// oM bruM badz+ra A yu she badz+ra hUM a/
22b4(dza): zhes brjod pas/ bde bar gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgyas bstan nas rgyas par bya'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra/ rat+na d+ha ra/ pad+ma d+ha ra/ karma d+ha ra/ ta thA ga ta/ sam
22b5(dza): ya ti kra ma ya d+ha rAt+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod pas bdud gshin rje nag po'i lag nas tshe phrags te/ gshin rje yang 'gyel zhing spangs nas bsgral zhing rdo rje khrag
22b6(dza): 'thung chen pos snying khrag 'thungs te/ tshe'i bar chod byas te/ oM puN+ye puN+ya/ ma hA pu N+ya a pa ra mi ta/ a yuHpu N+yA/ dz+nyA na saM b+hA ro pa tsi ti swA hA/ zhes
22b7(dza): bzlas pas/ sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe srog gi snying po/ oM bruM badz+ra mA lu she hUM A/ zhes bzlas pas/
23a1(dza): tshe skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gi sku tshe thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas tshe'i las 'di gsungs so// dbang
23a2(dza): phyug gtso dang rigs kyi yum// yang dag gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bde ba chen pos yongs brgyan te// dkyil 'khor rdzogs par phun sum ldan// rdo rje
23a3(dza): sems gtso mnyes mdzad pa// ga nas 'dir brtse phyir gshegs su gsol// oM e h+ye hi ma hA ka ru ni ka dri sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ brtan par bzhugs
23a4(dza): paye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen po bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya oM
23a5(dza): a badz+ra sa ma yA a/ hU~M badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ swa badz+ra sa ma ya sra/ haM badz+ra sa mA ya haM/ las la gzhug pa oMshar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// rdo rje lha mo dkar mo
23a6(dza): lcags kyu 'dzin// tshe dang ye shes 'dren pa'i las mdzod cig/ dkar mo zhi byed mgyogs ma 'od 'phro can// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes
23a7(dza): ma lus dbang du bsdud // bru badz+ra A yu she badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHdzaH/ lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// ser mo yid bzhin rin chen glog 'phreng 'dzin// phyag na rin chen sbrul gyi
23b1(dza): zhags pa basnrums// tshe la gnod ting 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud// nub kyi phyogs nas tshe 'gugs ma// dmar mo bkra bsal
23b2(dza): dbang sdu ma// phyag na chu sri ni rgyal mtshan bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs
23b3(dza): pa ni/ nag mo mig gcig ral pa can// dung gi tshems la lcags kyi spu// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram pa snams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang
23b4(dza): ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings phyug ma rnams bskul nas// dbyings phyug mkha' ldan pad+mal dbyings// phyag rgya
23b5(dza): bde mchog dbyings kyi yum// ye shes sprul pa'i phyag rgya ma// dbyings gsum mkha' la tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// badz+ra A yu she hUM dza/ stong gsum dbyings la tshe yi
23b6(dza): mnga' brnyes ma// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// zhing la rngam zhing skam stobs can// stong gsum dbyings nas tshe dang gzi brjid drongs// dbyings ma dkar dang
23b7(dza): kun mo gnyis med tshogs// bde chen rmongs byed thal byed ma// gtum mo dbyings su sgrol mdzad snying 'byin ma// dpal chen rgyal po dgyes pa'i 'khor// dung 'phreng chen mo 'khor
24a1(dza): dang bcas// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// dbyings su mkha' la tshe dang gzi byin drongs// log par lta byed bdud dpung 'dul mdzad na// 'dod
24a2(dza): khams ma dang gnyis med rol pa'i sras// dbang phyug 'phra men mche gtsigs 'bar ba'i tshogs// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// gshin rje'i lag nas tshe dang gzi byin
24a3(dza): drongs/ shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tsha yi lha mo lcags kyu ma// phyag na shel gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sgrol bar byed// lho yi phyogs nas
24a4(dza): 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo zhags pa ma// phyag na mthing shun bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed 'ching bar byed// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha
24a5(dza): mo lcags sgrogs ma// phyag na zangs kyi bum bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed sdom par byed// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo dril bum// phyag na g.yu
24a6(dza): yi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud// steng gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo dbyings phyug ma// phyag na dngul gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la
24a7(dza): gnod cing 'gal byed dbang du sdud// 'og gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// tshe yi lha mo bstan ldan ma// phyag na gser gyi bum pa bsnams// tshe la gnod byed ma lus dbang du sdud//
24b1(dza): oM bru badz+ra A yu yu te/ rat+na yu te/ d+harma yu te/ karma yu te/ bruM badz+ra A yu she hUM a/ de nas dngos grub blang ba ni// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun 'chang ba/
24b2(dza): rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// ding bdag sangs rgyas sku 'dzin pa// byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas mdzod cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa Ad ma ko&haM/ dpal ldan rdo rje
24b3(dza): gsung 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// ding bdag sangs rgyas gsung 'chang ba// byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ba ka badz+ra swa b+ha ba Ad ma ko&haM/
24b4(dza): dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum dang ldan// ding bdag sangs rgyas thugs 'dzin pa'i// byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa
24b5(dza): b+hA wa ad ma ko&haM/ dam tshig nyams pa thams cad skongs par gyur cig/ lta ba yon po thams cad spongs par gyur cig/ cho ga nyams pa thams cad rdzogs par gyur cig/
24b6(dza): tshe sku gsung thugs kyi skye shi med pa'i dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sku gsung thugs
24b7(dza): sprul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs so// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ mahA rag ta'i mgo ma ye shes kyis byugs la/ dbus su badz+ra he ru ka/ yum gro d+ha
25a1(dza): shwa rI 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ lho ru rat+na he ru ka/ nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ byang du kar+m+ma he ru ka/ sku mdog phyag mtshan
25a2(dza): rgyud gzhan dang mthun/ de'i phyi rim du snam bu gcig la 'phra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyi rom sgo bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor 'do ma gang gru bzhi la dri chen gyis maN+Dal byug/ dbus
25a3(dza): su yag shra he ru ka dbu dgu/ phyag bco brgyad/ zhabs brgyad/ gshog pa rdo rjes gtams pa/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ shar du badz+ra he ru ka
25a4(dza): g+ho ra yak+Sha he ru ka/ nub tu bi shwa he ru ka/ byang du sa ma ya he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma yum bzhir bzhugs/ gdan zhing bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs so//
25a5(dza): de'i phyi rim snam bu la 'phra men dang khro bo pha bcu ma bcu dgod cing bzhugs so// sgo bzhir lcags kyu la sogs pa bzhi dgod do// khro bo chen po nI la daN+Da dbus su bri/
25a6(dza): de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ sprul pa'i khro bo shugs can dang / 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dang /
25a7(dza): rdo rje gsus po che dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / gad mo rgyangs can dang / 'di rnams go rims bzhin bri/ sgo bzhi gzhan dang mthun/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru
25b1(dza): bzhi la rnam par rgyal ba dbus su bri/ pad+ma 'dab bzhi la/ sha ra du rdo rje grags chen/ lho ra khro bo gad mo t+ya na/ nub tu khro bo he he grags chen dang / byang
25b2(dza): du rdo rje bgegs gnon pa'i rgyal po bri/ de'i phyi ro me sgo snam bri/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gshin rje gshed po bri/ phyi rim pad+ma 'dab
25b3(dza): brgyad la 'phra me na ma sing ha la sogs pa brgyad po bri/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'do ma gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dbus su bri/ de'i phyi
25b4(dza): rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ khro bo 'gying ba dang / khro bo glang po che dang / khro bo ko rlon po dang / khro bo mig mi bzad pa bzhi rim bzhin du bri'o// phyi'i sgo
25b5(dza): rnams dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su ha ya gre ba bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la ke'u ri brgyad bri/ phyi rim rnams su dgod/ dkyil
25b6(dza): 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la Ta ki rA dza dbus su dgod do// phyi rim pad+ma brgyad la/ khro bo bde ba dang / so'i 'phreng ba dang / du tshan dang / khu chur dang / g.yab
25b7(dza): mo dang dga' ba dang / 'degs pa dang / hUM chen rnams bri/ sgo rnams dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bri/ 'khor lo rtsi bas bzhi la/ shar
26a1(dza): rdo rje spu can dang / zangs kyi gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi mche ba can dang / spu gri so can dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la
26a2(dza): khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dbus su dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ stag gi mgo can dang / g.yag gi mgo can dang / sha ba'i mgo can dang /
26a3(dza): byi la'i mgo can rnams so// sgo bzhi rim bzhin du dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ khro bo hU ka ra dbus su dgod/ 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la/
26a4(dza): spyang khu'i mgo can dang / wa'i mgo can dang / dam gyi mgo can dang / dred mo'i mgo can rnams dgod do// sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'odom ga gru bzhi la/ stobs
26a5(dza): po che dbus su dgod/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje gdengs mo/ lhar rdo rje sder no// nub tu dur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje gtun khung rnams
26a6(dza): rim bzhin du dgod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo de rnams kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dbus su khrag
26a7(dza): 'thung chen po ni// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad pa// gshog pa rdo rje gtam pa gdengs// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bstan// de yi 'khor gyi khro mo ni// phyag kyang srin
26b1(dza): bo ltar mthun te/ zhabs kyang de dang 'dra bar bstan// shar gyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo rnam par rgyal ba ste// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum
26b2(dza): phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// dri za bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// shar lho mtshams na bzhugs pa ni//
26b3(dza): khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can// sku mdog sngal 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// me lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs
26b4(dza): 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ya mA na tA ka gshin rje gshed// sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//
26b5(dza): zhabs drug rdo rje brag stangs na// ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo mi g.yo mgon po ni//
26b6(dza): sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na/ kha dan bral bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba
26b7(dza): 'dul tshul lo// nub kyi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ha ya gri ba rta mchog dbang // sku mdog dmar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug ga shog pa can//
27a1(dza): zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo ta kri ra tsa ste// sku
27a2(dza): mdog dud kha 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag ste dran// rlung lha bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul
27a3(dza): tshul lo/ byang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// sku mdog ldang la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs
27a4(dza): drug rdo rje brag stangs na// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// byang shar mtshams na bzhugs pa ni// khro bo khams
27a5(dza): gsum rnam par rgyal// sku ma dge sngo sgyu 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyug drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// bi na ya ka'i khri la bzhugs//
27a6(dza): 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// steng gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// phra bo hUM mdzad hU ka ra// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can//
27a7(dza): zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// 'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ma hA ba la stobs po che//
27b1(dza): sku mdog nag la 'od zer 'gro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje thag stengs na// sa bdag bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong
27b2(dza): ba 'dul tshul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo ya man ta ki'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'di skad ces bskul lo// bdud du tA nag po 'dul bar
27b3(dza): mdzad do// hUM gtumatshan rab 'byams 'jig rten 'joms mdzad lha// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag cha mang po bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar//
27b4(dza): rab 'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje skul klu dbang rab brgyan cing // gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags rlon sku la brgyan// brkyang bskum tshul gyis rab
27b5(dza): 'jigs gshin rje gnan// zhing chen khrag 'dzag zod rlon sku la brgyan// mi bzad rgyal po gdong drug hUM sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum sngangs mdzad zhabs drug go//
27b6(dza): sha za'i mgo bcud dbu yi rgyan du thogs// spyan bzlog tsam gyis thog 'bebs me stag 'phro// ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing // ma mo rnams kyang
27b7(dza): sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros// stong gsum med par mdzad pa'i zhal gdangs la// tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi thig 'dzag cing // nang stong srin mo'i tshogs rnams
28a1(dza): 'dar zhing 'bros// rkan sgra gtogs pas lha chen khyab 'jug kyang // bu ba 'gye la bcas par khrag skyug nyid la 'dud// phyag na mi thod rlon
28a2(dza): pa bsnams pa ni// dngos grub phyag gis klad khrag zhal du stobs// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad dbu yi brgyan du byas// zhing chen mgo nas che ma chem za bar byed// rgyu 'phreng
28a3(dza): khrag dang bcas par thogs nas ni// khyod mtho tsam gyis rab 'jigs nyid la 'dud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang
28a4(dza): sprul pa'i khye'u bzangs dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis me tog gtor nas bka' nod pa'i tshul du go de bzhugs
28a5(dza): pad la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gung la thog thog mi bzad pa// khye'u chung sngon po mkha' la lding // ya man ta ka khro bo ste//
28a6(dza): sku yang che la bam ldir bzang // sku mdog stang zil bcag pa 'dra// phyag gnyis dang po kha tAM ga/ ba ra ma rdo rje dril bu bsnams// mtha' ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te//
28a7(dza): 'khor ni 'phra ma na brgyad kyis bskor// nga nyid yin te skal ba bzang // skal bza' nga yi dam tshig gis// dag la ches chem mi bzad pa// bsgrags pa ral pa gcig
28b1(dza): pa yin/ dam tshig dus las ma 'da' zhig/ ces bsgo'o// TI bka' stsal pa bzhin du las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do// de nas
28b2(dza): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ma dang 'phra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// las bcol bar mdzad do// kro d+hi shwa ri dpal
28b3(dza): 'bar ma// khams gsum dbang sdud srid la mnga' mdzad ma// las su gsod la dga' ba mo// shan pa spu gri rnon po so// ro la rngam pa'i khwa dang khwa// 'byung po
28b4(dza): tsit+tA mchog la rol// mthing kha mchog ston dpal gyi yum// rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma// ke'u ri mu yi mchod pas rol// gser gyi 'od 'phra mda' gzhu
28b5(dza): 'gengs// rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma// tse'u rim yi mchod pas rol// bra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin// pad+ma gsung gi dbang phyug ma// pra mo ha yi mchod
28b6(dza): pas rol// nag mo rol pa thod pas 'gyings// karma las kyi dbang phyug ma// be ta li yi mchod pas rol// gtum mo zhe sdang spu gri so// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i
28b7(dza): dbang phyug ma// pu ka si yi mchod pas rol// pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// pu ka si yi mchod pas rol//
29a1(dza): rin chen me lce'i glog 'phreng 'dzin// gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// smra sha ni yi mchod pas rol// las su dgra sta 'bar
29a2(dza): ba 'dzin// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// tsan d+ha li yi mchod pas rol// sing ha gsod byed seng ge'i mgo/ ro mchog za ba'i 'phra man ma// bya g+h+ri mgo
29a3(dza): gcod stag gi mgo/ thod rlon za ba'i 'phra me na ma// sri la du ra kun wa yi mgo/ du ra sri ma yi 'phra men ma// shwa na sha 'grang spyang mo'i mgo/ sha chen za ba'i
29a4(dza): 'phra men ma// gri d+ha khrag 'thung bya rgod mgo/ khrag tshil za ba'i 'phra ma na ma// kang ka mu ka du ra bya'i mgo/ dug gsum 'dzem pa'i 'phro men ma// kha la rgyu 'dren pho
29a5(dza): rog mgo/ dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i 'phra man ma// hu lu tshe 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/ glu snying za ba'i 'phra men ma// stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo/ byi la spyang
29a6(dza): khu wa yi mgo/ de ma drag phag gi mgo can rnams// thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas sku la 'brel
29a7(dza): cing las mthar phyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dza dza lcags kyus glo snying 'dren// a mo sngon mo thod sbrul zhags/
29b1(dza): a li dmar po lcags sgrog sdom// bas na ljang khu dril 'khrol dgyes// zhes bka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
29b2(dza): po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las/ ye shes kyi khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo
29b3(dza): sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'bar 'byung ngo // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs
29b4(dza): rnam pa bzhis ni brgyan// dar dang dril bu chen po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan// rin chen mu tig 'bras bus sbas// do shal rkang gdub rnams kyis brgyan//
29b5(dza): sna tshogs gzig gi rnam bres pa// sna tshogs 'phreng ba gos kyis brgyan// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste// ka ba mchog brgyad yang dag ldan// dbus su dga' byed spyan
29b6(dza): la ni/ rdul la brtsigs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan de dag ces bya// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' ni// s+thAn de la
29b7(dza): ni gzhag par bya// tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor bus dbu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug gi rnam par mdzes//
30a1(dza): tshad med dang ni sbyangs pa yi// dbul tshul pos mdzes par byas// sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas// dga' byed
30a2(dza): yid tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje che// snying kha ra gsor la rab tu brtson// ba de la sogs pa yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob ma
30a3(dza): 'am yang na gzhan yang ru nga // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la// tshul bzhini byin gyis brlabs bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam
30a4(dza): gzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug nas ni// bdag ni ra ba dgyes rjes su smra// der ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed
30a5(dza): phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i// gsang ba 'dis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// yid 'ong bu mo btsal byas te// snying kha
30a6(dza): 'tshogs ma mgrin spyi bo// lha snam la sogs 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgya rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya yis//
30a7(dza): oM bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya// mdun du lha mo myos byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i ro la dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis// thams cad rgyan dang ldan pa
30b1(dza): ldan/ lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog/ shes rab can gyi mdun du gzhag/ g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal
30b2(dza): rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' che la mnyes mdzad cing //
30b3(dza): de ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma// pad+ma dmar po mdog gi 'od// chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes pa'o// sku yi tsha da ni nyi shu gcig/
30b4(dza): dga' byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis yang dag klubs// sna tshogs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi
30b5(dza): bya ba rab brlag bzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste// sna tshogs dgod pa rjes brlabs pa// sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson//
30b6(dza): ldan dang lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos mdzad ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar ni na bzar gsol// gru rnams dag ni thams cad
30b7(dza): du/ gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams dang // bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa// gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams
31a1(dza): thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan 'ga' la rnam mos pa// sgo srungs bzhi ni gzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna
31a2(dza): tshogs rnams// pi wang gling bus brdab pa dang // rdza rnga rnga chen ku mu ta// mu ra rtsa dang da ra dang // ga ra dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa dang // rol mo yo byad sna tshogs
31a3(dza): rnams/ dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du// rdo rje nam mkha' 'gro ma gzhag/ yi dgas
31a4(dza): phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi la char ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis sdigs byed cing // sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang //
31a5(dza): rkang dang tshal bu za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te gdug pa ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang
31a6(dza): 'phrog par byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams dang // shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste// gtsug
31a7(dza): lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chags pa chen po chags bral dang // 'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// rab tu sbyor bas
31b1(dza): sbyor byas te// ci rigs nub tu gzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang bsrung ba dang // gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag phrog/ sngags mkhas ci rigs byang du gzhag
31b2(dza): shar gyi gru ru gzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong gi mig 'phrul te// 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ji ltar rjes su 'thun byas te// yi dgas stan la yang
31b3(dza): dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gi gdong 'dzin te// lag par gri dpa 'khar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za'o// nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa//
31b4(dza): bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong rid ma// khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong // gsus po che la lho 'phyangs rnams// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// rnga mo bong bu'i gdong
31b5(dza): 'dzin ma// khros par dang khyi yi ga dang // rgyu ma'i mgo nas za bar byed// shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus
31b6(dza): pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// lto 'phyangs po la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thab par brtson pa yi// lce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams// 'jigs byed gdong gi mchi
31b7(dza): ba can// rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin pa// sgo rnams kyi ni phyogs rnams kun// sgo bzhi rnams ni gzhag par bya// byang gi phyogs su 'bod 'brogs te/
32a1(dza): bum pa rnams ni shar nyid du// nub tu rnam par 'jigs pa'o// lho ru gshin rje rgyal po gzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ nam mkha'
32a2(dza): 'gro bas kun tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// dgyes shing
32a3(dza): spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dud par
32a4(dza): byed/ bskul ba yi ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gtso la mnyes par byed// kye mchos ni ngo mtshar che// kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che//
32a5(dza): kye ma bde byed yang dag 'byung // kye ma kun tu bzang po don// kye ma rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs// kye ma bde ba dga' ba che// kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma
32a6(dza): sngags kyis yang dag sbyor// kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor// kye ma phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs// kye ma sgrub pa rmad du byung ba'o// kye ma pha rol phyin pa yis// kye ma
32a7(dza): ji ltar mthun rigs pa// kye ma dgongs pa sna tshogs che// kye ma dag pa mnyam sbyor ba// kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'o// kye ma pad+ma rnam phye ba// kye ma dbang po
32b1(dza): gnyis sbyor ba'i// kye ma mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma gar ni dag pa che// kye ma glu rab dri ma med// kye ma sil snyan rnam par 'khrol// kye ma brda dang
32b2(dza): mun sel ba'i// kye ma dga' dang me tog 'phreng // kye ma mar me mun pa sel// kye ma dri ni shin tu bsil// kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma sgyu ma
32b3(dza): nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma sangs rgyas nam mkha' 'dra// kye ma rin chen bde mchog skye// kye ma sna tshogs sgyu ma mdzad// kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang // kye ma ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams// kye ma ngo
32b4(dza): mtshar sems dpa' che// kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi rnams// shin tu dgyes cha rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje sems dpa' 'gying ba yis//
32b5(dza): dga' dang bde byed bskyed par 'gyur// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i spyan gyis ger mdzad de// spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// yid
32b6(dza): tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas baR+Ya ni nu mar 'dud// rked pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs// rnams kyi gos kyang che la mdzes// chags pa
32b7(dza): cung zad tshems kyis gdon// tshems kyi 'phreng ba kun da zla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin pa'i// rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod// bud med
33a1(dza): gzugs ldang mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum du// dben par mchod pa rab
33a2(dza): tu brtsam// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog/ spyan la sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob
33a3(dza): par 'gyur// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis// pad+ma rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du dkar// yid du 'o ba bsgom par bya// bzhin
33a4(dza): bzangs phan par 'dod pa yis// bud med rnyed na chog bzhin// bde bar mchod cing brtsam par bya// ye shes sems dpa' sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs /
33a5(dza): ni bsgom par bya// sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du// bud med rtag tu gzhag par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis
33a6(dza): pa// dben pa'i gnas su khyad par du// bsgrub pa pa ni rtag tu bsgrub// mtshan nyid dag ni yongs su dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes// rgyan rnams thams
33a7(dza): cad yongs su rdzogs// spang bar gzhag nas rnam par bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// bu mo ut+pal mthing kha'i mdag/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu
33b1(dza): bsgrub/ sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas na las rnams brtsam par bya// bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la// rigs kyi sbyor
33b2(dza): bas rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// na chung gzhon nu mig bzang btsal// gzugs bzang gzhon pas brgyan
33b3(dza): pa yi/ lo grangs nyi shu lnga lon pa'i// bzung nas byol song skyes gnas brtag/ bzhin bzang shin tu mdzes pa yi// na chung mtshan ldan skal ba mchog/ mig bzang brtan
33b4(dza): pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// dben zhing rab tu nyams dga' bar// sbyor bar mchod pa kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla
33b5(dza): pa phyed kyis nges par 'grub// mig dkyus ring zhing skra lo 'jam// lus ldem dbyibs dgu blo dag cing // bstan pa chags shing bcos su btub// lung nyan ci la thogs pa
33b6(dza): med/ rked pa phra la ro smad zlum// stod ni drang la shin tu rgyas// tshems dkar mgul ring phyag sor ring // dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog/ gzungs ma mtshan ldan
33b7(dza): spyad par bya// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem rab tu mdzes// yid 'ong 'dzum 'phran spyan zur gzigs// mkhur chos dkar por gdab par bya// dkar 'dzin phyir zhing mnye bya ste// /
34a1(dza): pad+ma'i ze ba chen pos 'dab/ pad+ma lan gsum mnye byas te// mchan khung 'don gsum rnam pa gnyis// zangs kyi mdog gis gzung bar bya/
34a2(dza): de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi btsun mo dang bcas par gyur te/ de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do// zhi ba kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyoms kun gyi spro bsdu yi// gsum
34a3(dza): pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang // phyag rgya tshogs mchog de dag las// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs 'dzin// cha
34a4(dza): chung med par gsal bar bsgom// dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu// cod pan lnga yi rin chen las// rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin//
34a5(dza): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthing kha 'bar ba'i yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro ba sdu las// phyag rgya gsal bas sku gsal
34a6(dza): ba'i/ rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// tsan pa na lngar ldan yi ge ra gsal// thams cad bya dbyangs
34a7(dza): yi ge gter// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgya gsal// las ni thams cad kun gyi mchog/ rgyal po rnam par rol pa'o// pad+ma rA ga
34b1(dza): 'dra ba'i mdog/ chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa na// thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad// sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgya gsal
34b2(dza): ba ra dbang gis bskur// btsun mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// gnyis su med par 'khril ba yis// dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan// rin chen rigs kyi spro ba sdu las//
34b3(dza): cod pan rigs lnga'i kha dog ste// ji bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+mo tshul// mnyam par gsal bas dkyil 'khor yin// mi phyed pa yi ting 'dzin
34b4(dza): gyis/ rdzogs pa dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog/ pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgya gsal// mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom// chu skyes
34b5(dza): 'jam pa 'og tu ldan// steng dang spyod pa'i rol mo yis// dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bshams// 'di ltar gsal bas dbang yang rdzogs// thams cad bsdu ba zhes
34b6(dza): bya ba/ de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad// dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che// rigs kun 'dus pas bde bar gshegs// mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin te// yi ge
34b7(dza): 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog/ bshad pas khyad par las kun rdzogs// chu skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i steng // gnyis su med par gsal bas na// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag
35a1(dza): gis/ 'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa// 'dod cing chags pa ma yin te// blo la yid gnyis med pas na// phyag rgya gsal bas rgyal ba'i
35a2(dza): sruHta rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes// dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu// bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med//
35a3(dza): gnyis su med par 'khril bar gsal// dus kun tu ni mnyam ldan pa// gsal ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// zla rgyas lta bu gtso bor bsgom// chags pa med par 'dod
35a4(dza): bsdu yi// yum dang lhan cig bsgom pa ni// a li ka ra byed pa'i don// phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen po'i tshul gnas pa// rgyal ba kun kyang de bzhin mthun//
35a5(dza): phyag lag bsnol mar gnas pa yis// kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya rdo rje thal mo ni// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol// zhal gnyis mdzes par rab
35a6(dza): sbyar bas// rma kham pa yi lcags gnyis mdzes// dung gi phur bus mkhur tshos la// 'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa// rgyal
35a7(dza): ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/ bzhad pas 'dzum pa'i gtso gtsongs bsgom// rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don// gsang ba'i spyod pa shin tu dgyes// gsang ba nyid du sems
35b1(dza): can 'dren// thams cad kun gyis rmongs pa sel// yum gyi las kyi khyad par ni// sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing // zas skom bgo ba dbang med pa'i// nyan thos 'gog pa
35b2(dza): la sogs pa// byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis// dam par bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag
35b3(dza): rgya chen po tshogs mchog ste// dga' ba'i don du rigs mchog yin// myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na// gdon mi za bar 'grub pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis// gsang
35b4(dza): ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i don dang mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'o// kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang ba nyid
35b5(dza): kyang mkha' dbyings so// yi ge oM ldan tsheg drag bcas// rnal 'byor bde tshan nyid kyi sras// gzugs khams lha chags byin brlabs te// phyag mtshan 'khor lo gsal
