35b6(dza): ba dang / bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs// gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gsal// nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du// gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das// dbus su
35b7(dza): yi ge gnyis pa la// rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis// legs par brgyan pa'i mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen por bzhugs
36a1(dza): tshul dang // ting 'dzin mthun par 'gro la gzigs// pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas pa'i// thig bzhi gsang ba bzhi dang ldan// mdun du lha mo
36a2(dza): chags pa mo// lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan// ma hA su kha gnas la dgyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa ga ra dang bcas// gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni// gtso la
36a3(dza): brten pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rgyab tu lha mo dgyes chen mo// sangs rgyas brten pa'i mdzes tshul gyis// thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa// sku tshe bcu drug sha dmar
36a4(dza): su// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par spyod// 'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa
36a5(dza): rnams dbang med par// drag por sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// gnyis su med par sbyar ba yis// gtong ba med par bstan pa'i
36a6(dza): tshul// sngo bsangs mdog ldan khyad par che// sku tshad bco lnga chags pa can// dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes// stag dang skrag pa'i cha lugs kyis// sems can
36a7(dza): kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khrug/ rab tu bskams pa'i 'gog pa rnams// bslang nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad// a ti ma li 'phrin las kyis// thams cad byang chub
36b1(dza): chen po mdzad// mig gnyis 'dzum dang sbom po dang // dbang po ldan par byas pa na// gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin// sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// ma
36b2(dza): gtang gzhug par brtson byas pa'o// so so rnam bsnams kha phye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na// dus la bab ces bya ba yin//
36b3(dza): 'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la// dam can bud med mi 'dud pa// dngos grub mi tho ba dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun tu brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar brtson par
36b4(dza): byed pas na// g.yan pa bskyed pa rnam bzhi yis// skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du// rdo rje pad+ma'i mtshams nyid du// dbyings phyug lnga yi sbyor ba yis// dal bu dal
36b5(dza): bus gzhug par bya// dal bu dal bus rab bskul te// drag po tshig gis spros pa dang // byang chub sems kyis pad+ma dag/ sbom po dba'ang ma lnga rnams kyis// yum
36b6(dza): gyis blangs la gtso la mchod// nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te// bsnyen pa'i tshe chung rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor la// mchod pa brgyad kyis
36b7(dza): mchod par bstod// de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan// dus gsum kun gyi gdung
37a1(dza): 'dzin pa// g.yon phyogs sten pa'i skal dang ldan// na chod lo ni bcu drug pa// sdong po rul pa dag la dgyes// g.yas pas zur gyi
37a2(dza): spyan gyis gzigs// dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson// rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan ca na// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda
37a3(dza): dang bcas pa'i gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyi// mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas
37a4(dza): mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor ba bskul// so sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyen dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// de nas
37a5(dza): gsal ba chen po dang gnyis su med par 'khril pa chen por gyur ste/ g.yan pa bskyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang / pa ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par
37a6(dza): mdzad nas/ rab tu dgyes glu 'di blangs so// e ma ho/ bad mchog las skyes phyag na rdo rje can// chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba// 'byung gnas
37a7(dza): chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen// e ma hong mtshar che'o zhes blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa/ mdangs
37b1(dza): bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring // sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri// yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen// tshems dkar sum cu rnga rngo med// mgul pa zlum rings rab tu
37b2(dza): legs/ gser sgra g.yu spras g.yas su 'khyil// gzungs ma 'di dge bstan par bya// skad gdangs mi snyan ra ra bo// yang na rmongs bag sub sub mo// glang bu
37b3(dza): sbrang bus gtses pa'i sna sgra bzhin// sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog/ dam can dag la g.yel bar ldog/ phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can// de bsnyen na ni dngos grub
37b4(dza): nyams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma la// rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin// bden gnyis so sor snang ba yi// yum gyi mkha' zhes
37b5(dza): rgyal bas gsungs// ma na ra lam chen kun bsgoms na// kun tu bzang mo bsgoms pas 'grub// bud med las ni mchod brten na// ye shes chen po 'grub par
37b6(dza): gsungs// dpal kun tu bzang po'i thabs dang shes rab kyis longs spyod 'di gsungs so// mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa ni// phun sum du ni dga'
37b7(dza): spyad na/ rnal 'byor sdom pa gnas pa yin// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun tu khyab pa kun tu spyod// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de byi dkar sham mdog
38a1(dza): dang ldan// bong drug bong tshod ring ba dang // lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba dbyes che og sko/
38a2(dza): phra/ num chung zhing so ma ring // yid tsam bzur la mig dkyus ring // dkar cing tsan dmar mdangs su ring // so dkar thags bzang mtshams su ring // skad bzang
38a3(dza): mdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di las bzho bar byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab
38a4(dza): dben par rab brtags te// sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog dang ldan// lus 'breng zlum la cha byad can// so dkar thags bzang mig dkyus ring // skad phra mdog dgod
38a5(dza): spro ring ba// dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa// sme nag las gos gnas pa ni// rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za
38a6(dza): bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor spyod pa dga' ba ni// sbyor ba rtsom pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing // rkang
38a7(dza): lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum rtsan dmar tsha// blun du chags pa mi shes med// lus la mtshan gyis rmad 'dras brgyan// tshag gsal rmi lam nyung ba
38b1(dza): dang / so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// cho ga shes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad+ma ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga'
38b2(dza): spyad na/ 'dod khams lha yi skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// lus zlum brtun pa nga rgyal can// khong na sems brnog sems la 'dzin// bya ba 'dra
38b3(dza): la mi gtang ldan// bslab pa'i blo brtul cha rus che// mdangs brtags bkrag na phyi phyir gsal// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dang // rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis/
38b4(dza): bag chags yi ge tshar gcod cing // ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis// yum gyi pad+ma kha phye zhing // bde ba
38b5(dza): thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis// 'jig
38b6(dza): rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na// snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po gsungs// shan pa rigs ngan smad
38b7(dza): 'tshong ma// ngan pa'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams// 'joms pa po yi ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs// yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang //
39a1(dza): khyi dang rus sbrul sbrul la sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so so tsam par dga' spyad na// las mchog dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//
39a2(dza): rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel// zhe sdang can la 'tshem par ston// drags pa can la zhi ba che// brtson par dga' ba brtson par mdzad// thabs kyis mdzad spyod kun
39a3(dza): gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams// gdul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum
39a4(dza): pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// e ma ho shin tu ngo mtshar
39a5(dza): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen po rab tu brtson par mdzad pa/ yid kyis 'phrog pa dang / zla kham byed pa dang / gyad 'gyed pa dang /
39a6(dza): 'bu ra ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do// sha mdog dka ra la nu ma 'bur// stod smad phyed la smin dkyus ring // pad+ma'i dri yang dung ltar bro// pad+ma legs pa
39a7(dza): gro yos 'dra// zlum la che chung snyoms pa'o// sha mdog dkar la sme ba can// stod smad phyed la sor mo ring // nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste// dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru bro//
39b1(dza): mgul pa legs la ring thung ran// pad+ma dmar la mkhur chos legs// spyan yang zlum la 'og nas blta// sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum// rked pa phra la ro smad zlum/
39b2(dza): rkang pa sor mo nang du sbyor// lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms// tshems kyang dkar la thags kyang dam// sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring // dri yang tsan dan dri ru br-i//
39b3(dza): yan lag lcug ma bzhin du mnyen// pad+ma ser la phra la ring // spyan yang phra la zur du gzigs// sha mdog nag la sme ba nag/ sha yang nag la rtsub pa ste// skad
39b4(dza): gdangs mi snyan ra ra bo// rmongs la mi shes su ba sub mo// nu rdog tshal nu shal ring // rkang pa sbo ma la sor mo thung // gdong yang leb la sme ba thug/ gdong yang
39b5(dza): thung la mig mi sdug/ lus po sbom thung mjing pa thung // pad+ma gnag la yangs pa ste// ba lang can gyi rigs zhes bya'o// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsan pa'i
39b6(dza): don ni rang dbang thob par nga lo yang // bcos su gtu ba la lung nyan pa// skad gsal lta bas thag rmod pa// spyod pas la dor rtog pa choms// yid gzhungs/
39b7(dza): blo rno dbang po gsal// sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag/ dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba// tshig la brdzun gyis dran thabs med// dad pa skyo dang dub pa med// spyod
40a1(dza): pa blang zhing dor ba med// brtson 'grus thang dang lhod pa med// ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa// gom pa dal la spyod pa gzog// mig 'bri tshugs//
40a2(dza): su mi lta zhing // 'og dang zur gyis rtogs par lta// dbu lo 'jam la lcang lor 'khyil// spyan bkra phra la ring ba dang // sna bzur zong la rgyud ma chad// ya yo nyag
40a3(dza): dang chad pa med// so dkar sum cu thag bzang ba// og sko sogs bu yu bzung 'dra// mdog sdug dka ra da ma ra mdangs phyed pa// rkad phran chang gang zlum pa dang // mgul//
40a4(dza): pa zlum la phra la ring // par mo bya yi tshul dang 'dra// sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang // phyag gi sor mo phra la ring // rna ba gro ba bcus pa 'dra// lho na dar ltabs khug pa
40a5(dza): bzhin/ dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra// gnyid chung sha yang skur bar byed// kha bsnams med la dri zhim pa// sna tshogs spos dri lus la bro// bskyod par mkhas
40a6(dza): shing las la dpa'// sbyor drod rigs dang ting 'dzin rigs// pad+ma da ma la spyod na dog/ nu ma dag ni chung la sra// kha ma chu srab la gzong ba po// lha yi sbyor ba tsog pu dang //
40a7(dza): mi yi gan kyal yi dgas zur gyis sbyor// byol song kha bub tu sbyar ro// gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhags zla'i tshad bzung ste dam du bcas nas/ mchod dus
40b1(dza): mi chags par phyi nang mi bsre/ dam bcas pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o// gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te/ mngal gyi srin bu kha dmar du
40b2(dza): skye'o// dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o// gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' mthun par bsgrubs
40b3(dza): las 'grub par 'gyur ba the tsom med do// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// he ru ka rol pa las/ gsang ba'i lha mo'i mchod pa
40b4(dza): sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//
40b5(dza): zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni/ oM las dpal chen yab lnga/ yum khrag 'thung rgyal
40b6(dza): mo lnga sku la rdzogs so// de nyid kyi lta bas srin por song gis dog nas ye shes lngar bstan no// a ltar snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ zla tshes me long lta bu'i
40b7(dza): ye shes/ na ro so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes/ ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ a la' btags pa bya ba na na tan gyi ye shes/ yab yum rnams kyang de bzhin sbyar/ chos
41a1(dza): thams cad ma skyes pa'i ngang las skyes pa'i cho phrul bstan to// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni/ phung po lnga/ rigs lnga/ 'byung ba lnga/ yum lnga
41a2(dza): khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang / sems ma dang / sprul ma dang / lcam dral/ phung po lnga he ru ka/ 'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/ khams dang

41a5(dza): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na/ bdag byang chub kyi sems mchod pas dgyes pa'i mnyes pas te/ 'grangs shing tshom par 'gyur ro//

41b1(dza): lus la 'od byung ba ni drod dang sbyar ro// 'don pa'i drod ni bdag sgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag lus rtsal 'dab g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro// drod kyi
41b2(dza): drod ni bdag gi sems rtag rtag rang rang nam mkhar 'phur snyam byed na/ mtha' ma dang sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dam
41b3(dza): par bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang ma'o// de gnyis su med par bsgrub pa ni/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems

41b7(dza): su shes pa ni// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren lhangs kyis// rgyal ba rgya mtsho thugs dam bskul// rdo rje srin po'i ngur sgra yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// mthun
42a1(dza): cing gdung ba'i dbyangs kyis su// ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul// khong gun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis// ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam
42a2(dza): bskul// 'khur pa dbugs kyi rlung 'byin pa// seng gdong la sogs thugs dam bskul// sngags kyi yig 'bru bzlas pa yis// rdo rje tshig la skal mdangs med/

42a7(dza): rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid
42b1(dza): kyi sku/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung // stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// thugs kyi sprul

42b7(dza): yum gyi mkha' dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// zas rab zas ni bsam mi khyab// rdo rje dri chen zas
43a1(dza): kyi mchog/ rdo rje ga pur zas kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig
43a2(dza): rten na/ rtaskom rab skom ni bsam mi khyab// rak+ta dwi mu skom gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skom// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sgyogs rab
43a3(dza): sgyogs ni bas ma mi khyab// ba na d+ha ga sar rnying sgyogs kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sgyogs// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yab rab yab ni bsam
43a4(dza): mi khyab ta/ kun tu bzang po yab kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab/ stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yum rab yum ni bsam mi khyab// kun tu bzang mo
43a5(dza): / yum gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum// au ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku// ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung // ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku//

43b1(dza): gsol/ ru lu'i dngos su snang ba'i sku// de nyid ma byung ma skyes pa ni gsung // snang ba dang ma byung ba gnyis su med pa ni thugs so// ru lu sku gsum/ gsung

44a1(dza): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo // pad+ma dz+wa la ma hA kro d+ha/ pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/ sarba duSh+TAn/

47a6(dza): zhing / shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba che// dbu rgyan thod brtsigs pa byas// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ mtshon cha sna tshogs /
47a7(dza): bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad 'chang byed cing // yi dgas chen po stag la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das
47b1(dza): pad+mo'i 'od zer 'phro ba'i 'od zer gyi 'phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo'i khro ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las
47b2(dza): phyung ngo // oM hri badz+ra pad+ma ba mu kaM/ kha khA khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho dA rI/ bi go hUM/ he hUM hUM hU hUM hUM/ hUM hri hA/ sha di shA/ ma tha ba/ badz+ra pa Da ba na la ma ho/ taM to//
47b3(dza): hUM hU/ hi hi/ hUM hU/ hi hi hU/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgyab tu gzhag par bya// rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro bo chen
47b4(dza): po dbu bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong // mi lto stan la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshan cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// khros pa'i dbu
47b5(dza): rgyan thod pa brtsams// 'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing // g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhugs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za ba'i rdo
47b6(dza): khro mo gnyis su med pa'i gdul ba'i thabs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje
47b7(dza): las phyung ngo // oM sarba a mo ka ma hA byi nang sha ri/ hU hUM/ ha haM haM/ ma gro ti gra ma khe/ ma hA byi shwa ru pa da rI ni/ sarba duSh+Tan/ pra sha mi ni/ hUM hUM hU phaT/ 'di
48a1(dza): nyid kyis ni ci rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du// g.yog dang bcas pa rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs dam tshig gzhag bya ste// sna tshogs
48a2(dza): gzugs dang khyad par ldan// kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas// gnyer ba dang ni bcum pa'i gdang // rab tu drag pa'i ro byang zhing // gdong gnyer thod pas rtse mo bya// /
48a3(dza): dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khra mo chen mo gdang gsum ma// za byed me bzhin lta ba yi// de yi ri bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang // rang
48a4(dza): gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan// dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de ni cho ga gcig bzhin du// 'byung mo phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa// phyi yi
48a5(dza): rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun tu yongs su bskor// gzhag ga ma bri bar bya yang rung // de ni de yi stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo// gdug
48a6(dza): pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas// de la sogs pa rim par ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i sngags rnams
48a7(dza): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra a nu rA ga ni ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra A ka ra sha ni ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM
48b1(dza): dza dza dzA/ hUM hUM b+h+rUM/ oM badz+ra gu la ma nur gi nI/ ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri hUM hU he ho phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra gra ma hA kro ti hU~M sa sa hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA te tsa a d+hiH
48b2(dza): ku hUM druM hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ti ka ko ra ke da kha ta thA/ oM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra he ru ka ma hA kro d+hi shwa r-i/ ma hA bi ts+tsha mo tsha ra pa ye hUM h+na hUM druM/ dr-i dr-i dra/
48b3(dza): oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi/ a Ti ha si ni hU~M hUM/ dr-i dr-i/ tr-i ta yA to to yA hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra kro Ta ga k+Sha ni hUM hUM hU/ b+hak+Sha yA/ b+hak+Sha yA/
48b4(dza): hUM hrI/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA badz+ra da ra badz+ra/ tig snA kro d+ha sha ri tshin Te tshine Ta hUM badz+ra ga sna ha ste/ tshe Ta yA tshe Ta yA/ pU hU~M ma tha ma ra/ oM sarba badz+ra kro d+ha ri Ni/ ma hA gra ru
48b5(dza): bi ni hUM hUM/ ba ta yA pa ta ya/ ma hA badz+ra tsakre na tsur+tha hU hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kre pra ba tsa ni hUM hUM hUM/ ma tA ma tA hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra ma hA thits+tsha
48b6(dza): mu khe hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra ma hA te/ hu du hang hang hang / phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra ya k+Shi ni hUM hUM/ kha khA khA hi khA hi/ a bI ba bI
48b7(dza): ba hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA badz+ra pa ni di ni ma hA wa da/ b+han d+ha yA b+han d+ha yA/ bi da yA hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra da hA da ni ma hA kro ti shwa ri hU hUM phaT phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra
49a1(dza): khrod ma la ni hUM hUM/ rmu rmu rmu/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hAkro d+ha gan dag sa ni hUM hUM/ gr-i gi/ oM sarba badz+rad ri ma hA kro tish+tsa ri ma hA ma tsa/
49a2(dza): ka la da ri ni/ pa yA had ho/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ma hA la sa hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha mA rba kro d+he shwa ra me le d+ha rA ni d+ha/ oM sar+tha badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri ni ri ti ne hU~M/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha rA ma
49a3(dza): tA ma hI kar shin/ dza dza hUM hUM dzA/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pa na hUM hUM hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi/ ban+d+ha ban+d+he ban+da yA ban+da yA hU baM/ oM sar+b+ba ta
49a4(dza): b+h+rUM ga tA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kr-i d+hi be she/ hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ oM hUM traM hri/ hI he ma ba ti pa hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi/
49a5(dza): snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra/ oM badz+ra da g+h+ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ta kri ni
49a6(dza): ma hA he ma pa ti ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta kri ni ku ma ri pri ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI dri shwa ma ra ye hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra mu ti ni/ bi da ya bi da yA/
49a7(dza): suM b+ha ni su~M b+ha ni hU phaT/ oM sarba DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra kro ta ra li hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi tsakra ni tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA mi thod bo ti ke hUM phaT/
49b1(dza): oM badz+ra DA ki nI se mya kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra dan te hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ma ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i ta ki ni pe li haste hUM phaT/
49b2(dza): oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA sa nu mya ga ba ti shwa ri hU phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI rming bu da na da ni hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI badz+ra pra ga li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI pi pa ru ti rA ma mA hA badz+ra pa
49b3(dza): li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra pa sha ba bA sha k+Sha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra sha ni pi shi pha phaT/ oM badz+ra tak+Shi nI ma hA badz+ra pi she hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI A
49b4(dza): na yA A na yA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra k+ShA ni ma hA badz+nyA be ka ni gu gu yA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI badz+ra dz+wa la yA b+hasmi ku ru hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ta kA ni ma hA badz+ra mi ka
49b5(dza): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA badz+ra he ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma ta badz+ra ki la~M pra bi she hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA su mangs sha ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra hUM
49b6(dza): phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra sha ni mi ta ka la mu ki ni hU dze dza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI A bi sha ni hU phaT/ khro bo spyi'i bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// i ba hurbi
49b7(dza): bi ta ro dra san 'di ta ti/ I she she ni she she/ sarba sarba bi da ni yA/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ dzA lI dz+wa laM/ pra dza le pra dza la/ gur bi gu ra bi/ gur bi bA gur bi bA/ k+Sha
50a1(dza): mA sar+b+ba dA nA~M/ \u0f7fTa/ yoms mams r+tha/ snun pa'i mangs na dang / dang // / da
50a2(dza): gsang ba'i khro bo bsnyen pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rol pa rdo rje khra bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
50a3(dza): nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ phyag brgya rtsa gnyis phyung ste/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA ban te/
50a4(dza): baM baM phaT/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI ma hA da sha na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ a a/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha/ sang mang sa ru ti/ ra ma ti/ da mri ya ma hA kum pa ru nahUM hUM hUM
50a5(dza): k+Sha/ oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha/ a gad ta mA/ pra be sha yA/ pra be shayA/ sarba badz+ra ka la/ ba shi na ban d+ha hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha ban+d+ha lA/ ban+d+ha yA/ bi sho kA/
50a6(dza): bi ba sha/ na sarba na hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ra shas/ ban d+ha yA ban d+ha yA/ sarba ma hA bi kri ta na na/ rgya gro ba hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
50a7(dza): bkyima'i sprul pa'i ting po dzin ma rnams pa zhugs te/ nyid kyi mu dang / gsung dang / grags de rnams byung // srug nas rdza nag gi chags so// tra hU~M bru~M ma
50b1(dza): hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/
50b2(dza): phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ phaT phaT phaT
50b3(dza): phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ zhal re re nas hUM dang phaT kyi sgra mang po phyung bas/ khro bo 'bum dus gcig tu phyung ste/ hUM dang phaT kyi sgra mang po 'byin cing 'jig rten gyi khams dus
50b4(dza): gcig tu gang bar gyur te/ dregs pa can thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ting
50b5(dza): 'dzin du zhugs te/ ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ma mo 'bum gyi rgyal po
50b6(dza): dbyings nas bzhengs// khyod ni ye shes lha mo 'bum gyi gtso// zhing lpags rlon pas sa gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma// zhing chen rlon pa gsang gzhi'i ral pa can// gzig lpags rlon pa
50b7(dza): stong gi sku smad klubs// sbrul nag 'bum gyi yan lag rgyan du bsgril// thod rlon thod skam thod tshal mgul chu dpung rgya na se ral kha// khyod kyi rdo rje thig gu gshog g.yas la// ye
51a1(dza): shes lha mo'i tshogs ni rgya yang 'tsher// khyod kyi rdo rje mthe'u gshog g.yon pa la// las byed lha mo dre gra ma brgya bcu gnas// nyin zhing rgya mtsho'i
51a2(dza): gting na bzhugs pa'i tshe// klu rgyal 'bum gyis dkris shing mchod pa 'bul// mtshan zhing ri rab rtse la bzhugs pa'i tshe// gnod sbyin bu mo khyod kyi pho nyar gtong //
51a3(dza): bdud kyi bu mo 'khrol zhing nga rgyal drag tu gnon// gshed ma don du gnyer zhing dgra snying tshal par 'gems// gsur chen dud pas 'jig rten ma lus 'gengs// sha
51a4(dza): chen ro la rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du bstag/ rang yang za zhing rags la ste ra bar byed// ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la// las la 'khril zhing chos
51a5(dza): kyi dbyings su brtan// mkha' 'gro za byed mgyogs ma gshog pa can// mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can// mkha' 'gro rngam pa'i zhal gdangs mche
51a6(dza): pa can/ mkha' 'gro 'byung po 'dzin pa'i sder mo can// mkha' 'gro khams gsum rngub pa'i ma chu rings ma// mkha' 'gro dug gsum za byed 'ab ra ba'i sku//
51a7(dza): las kyi mkha' la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma// don gyi mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes yum// de nas mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis las byed
51b1(dza): par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i rol pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting nge
51b2(dza): 'dzin du mdzad do// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum las skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyis mtshams sbyar te/ bdud ru tA nag po sems can dang rnal 'byor ba
51b3(dza): la 'tshe zhing gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ki'i rol pas pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang /
51b4(dza): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // til mar sna tshogs kyis lus bskus pa'i rdo rje mche ba can dang / nag mo mi'i thod pa thogs pa'i rdo rje 'phreng ba can dang / rnam
51b5(dza): 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang / mgo bo cad pa na leg spras rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / lag na mtshon thogs ma'i rdo rje 'phrag ma dang / dgra bgegs dbang du
51b6(dza): sdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul zlog ma dang / sbrul gyi ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thogs ma dang / zhing lpags sked par dkris shing khrag gis myos ma dang /
51b7(dza): mig rtsa dmar por gyur pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / mtshan mo dur khrod du rgyu ba'i 'byung ma sgrol ma dang / korlon smad dkris thod pa ser la khar thogs ma dang / mi ro rgyu
52a1(dza): mtshems kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rdza za ba mo dang / khrag gi thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje dri tshor ma dang / zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang /
52a2(dza): rdo rje zhag gi tshom bu can chen mo dang / rdo rje mi ro sha la chem chem za ba'i rdo rje mche ba 'dzin ma dang / drag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang / ma mo skrag par byed pa'i
52a3(dza): khams gsum dbang du sdud ma dang / zhing la rkam par byed pa'i rdo rje khwa tong khe dang / nag mo lus mdog ga nag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'phro ba mo dang / zas su khrag tshal za
52a4(dza): ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang / kun la dbang mdzad rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zas su sha rlom za ba'i rdo rje rngam mo dang / e ma mo tshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang / dpal ldan
52a5(dza): chen mo rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang / kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho skams ma dang / lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can
52a6(dza): dang lcags kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yung mig can dang / thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje dbyug ma dang / rdo rje ral gcig chen mo za byed ma dang / rdo rje tri shu thogs
52a7(dza): pa'i zhag gi tsham bu can dang / tshams ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul ma dang / rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdo
52b1(dza): gzugs can ma dang / cir yang 'gyu ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrang rnal 'byor sngo nag mo dang / mche ba gtsigs pa'i ral pa'i 'khyil ma dang /
52b2(dza): thod pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun dza la dang / dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang / sti ra chung ngu mang po sa brgyus nas rdo rje sku brjid ma dang /
52b3(dza): tsham ngam brkyang ba sku ma rdo rje 'jig rten sreg ma dang / bdud bzhi gnon pa'i rdo rje ban dar ldan pa dang / stir chen gling snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang /
52b4(dza): 'jigs su rung ba'i dbugs pa'i rje'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan zla can dang / log par lta ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang / rol rngam pa'i rdo rje zab ma dang /
52b5(dza): gsod cing spyod pa'i rnal 'byor sngo nag ma dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrang rdo rje mche ba gtsigs ma dang / tshang ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri shul mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gems
52b6(dza): ma dang dgyes par byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rdeb ma dang / 'gugs par byed pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum mo
52b7(dza): dang rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag mo dang / tsham ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stabs tshul can dang / rnal 'byor mthing nag rdo rje stir chen za ba ma dang / bdud
53a1(dza): bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa klad 'gems ma dang / gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang nag ma dang / khro gnyer 'jigs
53a2(dza): pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang / rdo rje tI shul rje'u 'dzani pa'i rkan sgra rdebs ma dang / 'ching zhing sdom pa'i rnal 'byor se ra nag dang / gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen tha
53a3(dza): pab mo dang / zhing chen nang khrol 'byin cing rdo rje tsham nga ma can dang / sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje mthing nag dang / spyan bgrad ma che gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang / sti ra 'dren pa'i/
53a4(dza): rdo rje khrag 'thung zhal du stobs pa dang / g+hu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje ban+d+ha dar ldan ma dang / zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wAM 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za ba mo dang / rol rkam pa'i rdo rje
53a5(dza): za stangs chen mo dang / rdo rje sar nag seng ge mgo can dang / mche gtsigs spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rje mig can dang / mche tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje zhe sdang
53a6(dza): 'joms ma dang / mthing nag rdo rje seng ge ral pa can dang / rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gzhi gsol ma dang / srog chags mang
53a7(dza): po'i snying 'byin rdo rje klad 'gem sa ma dang / dmar mo chen mo stir mgo can dang / ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs bzhi'i g.yang gzhi se ral khar
53b1(dza): thogs ma dang / bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang / ba na da rag ta sa bskang nas gas la stobs shing dgra sdang klad 'gems ma dang / gsod byed
53b2(dza): sngo nag du ra bya'i mgo can dang / mche tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang / thal chen rag tas rdo rje sku la brgya na ma dang / spu gri
53b3(dza): mgo gcad pa na da 'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang / rdo rje zhags pa 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stobs pa dang / mthing nag 'gying stabs rdo rje sh+lo na khyi mgo can dang /
53b4(dza): glo rting 'dren pa'i rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang / phrag dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba mo dang / dmar nag 'gying ba'i bya rgod can dang / zhing chen rgyud 'dren gti
53b5(dza): mug 'joms par byed ma dang / gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang / se ra nag 'gying ba'i pho rog mgo can dang / klu rnams 'dul bar byed
53b6(dza): pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang / mthing nag 'gying ba bya rog mgo can dang / ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro bu gsum
53b7(dza): ma dang / lcags kyus 'dren pa mi 'jigs sbyor ba dang / rdo rje bka'i pho nya spyan gsum mche ba can dang / rdo rje bran mo gtu ma bag can dang / 'jigs pa'i rdo rje gzugs
54a1(dza): can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / rdo rje g.yag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gzig gi mgo can dang / rdo rje byi la'i
54a2(dza): mgo can dang / rdo rje ba wang mgo can dang / rdo rje rnyed kyi mgo n+dan dang / rdo rje ma mig can dang / rdo rje sdig pa'i mgo can+da da / rdo rje wa'i mgo can dang /
54a3(dza): rdo rje stag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rta'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spyang khu'i mgo can dang / rdo rje pu shud kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sbyin gyi mgo
54a4(dza): can dang / rdo rje phag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje rnga mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje bya rog gi mgo can dang / rdo rje spyasbyang ta'i mgo can dang / rdo rje kang ka'i mgo can dang /
54a5(dza): rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spre'u'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khu byug mgo can dang / rdo rje seng ge'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rje srin
54a6(dza): bya'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sre mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje zer mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rje dmag pa thang 'gong gi mgo can dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zhags pa can dang /
54a7(dza): rdo rje me lce glog 'phreng 'dzin dang / rdo rje srin mo mdung thung 'phen ma dang / rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rje gru mo thog 'bebs mo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed pan
54b1(dza): glang gi sna dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung gdong ma dang / rdo rje lagan khrag thogs ma dang / rdo rje zla ba skur mda' ltar gtong ma dang / rdo rje dam tshig srung ma dpal 'brangs
54b2(dza): dang rdo rje lag na phur bu 'brel ma dang / rdo rje ri rab skyil ba'i rngam stabs can dngardo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin tu mi bsrun ma dang / rdo rje cir yang 'gyur
54b3(dza): ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chenA mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje smug nag pa stobs pa'i ma dpal can dang / rdo rje keng rus mche ba'i tshems rnon ma
54b4(dza): rdo rje bzhad ma'i shin tu gang rmyangs chen ma dang / rdo rje nang khras 'dren mA kA kI'i mgo ts+tsha n+d+ra dang / rdo rje sgyu 'byin 'brug rmugs ma dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi rin
54b5(dza): char 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje shugs 'chang rdo rje sgrol ma dang / rdo rje dbang ma rdo rje sder mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gshan pa spu gri rnon po'i sa can dang / rdo rjeg
54b6(dza): cha sra bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sprin tshogs mang po sdud par byed pa dang / rdo rje'u ra shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rka na sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang /
54b7(dza): rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang / rdo rje zhing chen khrag 'dzag zod rlon sku la brgyan pa dang / rdo rje drag
55a1(dza): po'i nga ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum dang / rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang / rdo rje seng ge stabs su mchong ba'i nga rgyal can
55a2(dza): dang rdo rje sprul pa mang po 'gyed pa'i bya khra khyi sdigs can dang / rdo rje ru tra sgrol ba'i bya khra khyi sdigs can dang / rdo rje sti ra gnas nyul bya khra khyi sgrigs can dang
55a3(dza): rdo rje dam tshig gi tshigs nyul ma byu khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje phyi nang mtshams nyul ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang /
55a4(dza): rdo rje de bye'i sbyor phul ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje 'dod chags ma bya khra khyi zhigs can dang / rdo rje dur khrod ro ba 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo
55a5(dza): dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma dang / rdo rje ser ma sbrul gyi ska rags can dang / rdo rje gnam lcags dur mo thogs 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje rgyal byed sngags par byed ma
55a6(dza): dang rdo rje rngam pas srin mo brgyal byed ma dang / rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang / rdo rje dbu stong spyan stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma
55a7(dza): dang rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro chen mo dang / rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang / rdo rje sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang / rdo rje
55b1(dza): rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang / rdo rje thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul mnga' ma chen mo dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang / rdo rje rin chen
55b2(dza): sku'i dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje pad+mo dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje dbyings la sbyor zhing sten byed ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin ma dang /
55b3(dza): rdo rje tshar ma dang / rdo rje myong ma dang / rdo rje reg byed kun la khyab ma dang / rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje sngo nag ral pa can chen mo dang / rdo
55b4(dza): ljang nag dbu ba rgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang / rdo rje ban glang gi mgo can ma dang / rdo rje ser nag dbug cog lnga ma dang / rdo rje spug nag dbu brgya ma dang /
55b5(dza): rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dbu ldu ma dang / rdo rje nag mo dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma bya phra
55b6(dza): khyi sgrigs can dang / rdo rje ser mo bya khra khyi skrigs can dang / rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo bya khra khyi skegs can dang / rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi skegs can dang / rdo rje
55b7(dza): mda' snyags ma bya phra khyi skegs can dang / rdo rje srul byed ma bya khra khyi sgrogs can dang / rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje rjod byed ma bya khra khyi zhigs
56a1(dza): can dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed ma bya khra khyi thigs can dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma gya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje 'phrog ma rlag byed ma b+ha wa Sh+ya
56a2(dza): snyigs can dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje khrag 'joms ma bya khra khyi sdigs can dang / rdo rje tshe 'joms ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje rmugs
56a3(dza): byed ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje srin mo snying zan mo byA khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje skal mo bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra khyi sgegs
56a4(dza): can dang / rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khwa khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje dkan 'jib ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang / rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khra khyi snyigs can dang /
56a5(dza): rdo rje sgrub mtshe 'dzin ma bya khra khyi sdigs can dang / rdo rje zod rlan dang sbrul nag 'khyil ba dang / rdo rje zhing chen stod g.yogs chu srin smad g.yogs can dang / rdo rje za byed
56a6(dza): kha 'bar ma dang / rdo rje nam mkha' lding dang / rdo rje khra dang 'ug pa dang / rdo rje b+ha rgod chen ma dang / rdo rje byan lag dang / rdo rje kang ka'i lus la chu srin gyi mgo can
56a7(dza): dang rdo rje gshog pa gtams pa dang / rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu ma dang / rdo rje mchu rtse gcig ma'i gzong can ma dang / rdo rje so gri can dang / rdo rje kha gdangs ma dang
56b1(dza): rdo rje dkar ma mud kar dang / rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs can dang / rdo rje smig bu'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba'i 'dun
56b2(dza): pa mo dang / rdo rje mas pa mo dang / rdo rje drab mo dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'byed pa dang / rdo rje dngab mo dang / rdo rje khab spu can dang / rdo rje ral gri
56b3(dza): spu can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi pags pa can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi kha spu can dang / rdo rje ka la bing ka'i dbyangs can dang / rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang / rdorje
56b4(dza): dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ched du 'dzin
56b5(dza): pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu rtogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs
56b6(dza): dang / rdo rje sgra'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro'i tshogs dang / rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang / rdo rje khro mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gos gyon ma'i tshogs
56b7(dza): dang rdo rje zag tung gi tshogs dang / rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje klu mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dbye
57a1(dza): par khyed ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad+ma 'phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprin sdud ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes
57a2(dza): pa ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gra ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje
57a3(dza): mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje zhing 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nga rgyal can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha' 'grod pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar
57a4(dza): chen po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'khar lo ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad+ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang
57a5(dza): rdo rje bka' nyan sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje spyod pas ci la thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su thab mkhas pa'i tshogs dang /
57a6(dza): rdo rje 'od 'phros pa 'bar ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rigs su skyes pa'i
57a7(dza): tshogs dang / rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sems ma ye shes su snang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms las med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyid
57b1(dza): lug med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje the tsom med par bsgrub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang
57b2(dza): rdo rje rnam par spros pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje brtan pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nam mkha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs
57b3(dza): dang rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdul ba la dgongs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gab pa mo'i
57b4(dza): tshogs dang / rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde
57b5(dza): ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rang snang mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun
57b6(dza): tu mang po'i tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab kyi mig dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje kun bzang longs spyod gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rmongs par byed pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje
57b7(dza): za mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khrag za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshal za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rkang za ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bsod nams gter 'chang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ye
58a1(dza): shes dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje zla mtha' yas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yon tan 'phrin las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lhun gyis grub
58a2(dza): pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gtum bag can dang / rdo rje gdug pa gtong ba sbrul gyi chun po can
58a3(dza): dang / rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa dang / rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus stong la mgo bcu pa dang / rdo rje lus la mgo gcig pa'i tshogs
58a4(dza): dang rdo rje lus sna tshogs dang / rdo rje yan lag 'bum yod pa dang / rdo rje gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo sbyong yod pa dang /
58a5(dza): lus sna ba rgyal mgo brgya ba dang / rdo rje lus bcu la mag gcig pa dang / mgo brgyad pa la nang ba brgyad pa dang / mgo dgu pa la rkang pa gcig pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi yang sprul gyi pho wA ni/ lcags
58a6(dza): kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang / long brgyab sbrel ba dang / nag pa mgo dgu po dang / shar gyi dkar mo spyan gcig dung gi khyi mo chen mo dang / lho'i nig mo sbrul gyi
58a7(dza): zhags pa can dang / nub kyi dmar mo zangs kyi mche ba can dang / byang gi ser mo dril bu can dang / rdo rje rus chen 'phreng ba can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi 'phreng ba can dang /
58b1(dza): rdo rje ljags kyi 'phrangab can dang / rdo rje ral gri so can dang / rdo rje nam mkha'i gung gcod ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhon ma dang / rdo rje chu bo'i gzhung 'dral ma dang / rdo rje
58b2(dza): mtsha'i gting dkrug ma dang / 'di rnams kyi sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa'o// drags byed bdag pos sgrol bar byed pa'o//
58b3(dza): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru kas sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las pho nya'i las 'di gsungs so// oM hU pho nya sum brgya drug cu rnams// yud tsam gyis
58b4(dza): ni kun 'dul zhing // yud tsam gyis ni phyogs bcu 'phro// sU dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po ral+lI ra// mgo gsum po la lcags sder can//
58b5(dza): mi sha za zhing bdud dpung 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing // klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms// rab tu ma bsrun 'di dag ni// 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya
58b6(dza): ste/ las rnams grub par bgyis nas ni// mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'phro// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma'i pho nyar bstan// glog 'gyu ba dang 'dra bar grags//
58b7(dza): chos nyid khyab pas mtshan ma dbyings su sdud// ye shes thugs rjes 'brel pas kun la khyab// 'phrin las dra bas 'gro ba rlabs kyis sgrol// de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma//
59a1(dza): oM dz+wa la badz+ra hUM/ ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyings su gcod// skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye gsal byed// 'phrin las 'gyus 'gro
59a2(dza): ba yud kyis sgrol// dra bas sdud la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren// badz+ra a mo ka hUM/ 'od zer dud ka 'phro ba ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrog cing // bskal pa'i 'brug bla chen
59a3(dza): po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs// mig gsum po la lcags sngar can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum pa// maM sa za zhing bdud khyim 'joms//
59a4(dza): ltas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing // klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste// ha ha ru lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang gis rlung phyogs
59a5(dza): song ba yi// khro bo thams cad nges 'jigs na mo bya tsir byo// ha ha ru ru b+hu d+hu b+h+ya/ mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po// lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin// rta mgrin gnas
59a6(dza): kyang nges pa ra 'joms// mgo drug po la rkang drug po// lag pa drug ni rgyu drug gcod// rkang pa drug ni phu ra bu ra 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyi ni// gang nas
59a7(dza): gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// rkang pa lcags phur rab tu drag/ 'od zer dud kas reg pa ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/ lag pa g.yon pas bskyod pas ni// 'phra
59b1(dza): men 'khor bcas ral bar 'bar// lcags kyu dgra sta rab thogs shing // zhing che na yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste
59b2(dza): rkang gsum po// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug bas shin tu che// rab tu mi
59b3(dza): bsrun 'di dag ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus kyang nag la 'od phung gnag/ yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan//
59b4(dza): ral pa nag cing ma che ba gnag/ mig kyang nag la lag pa nag/ mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas// las rnams thams cad
59b5(dza): grub par gyis// long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang // maM sa za zhing ri lung sgrol// mig kyang med la cang mi smra// yang na lag pa sbrel te 'gro// 'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste//
59b6(dza): las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// dung gi khyi mo chen mo la// dung gi khan glang sna khri can// dung gi mi mo chen ma zhon// lag
59b7(dza): na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum pa// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu la// lcags kyi mi mo chen mo zhon//
60a1(dza): nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// zangs kyi khyi mtshan mo la// zangs kyi mi mtshan mngon// lag na lcags sdug bsgril ma thogs// byang
60a2(dza): gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// gser gyi khyimo chen mo la// gser gyi mi ma tshan ma zhan// lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril// 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste// las rnams thams
60a3(dza): cad grub par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i pha nya ba sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la//
60a4(dza): dbus su 'khor la rtsibs bzhi la// dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa sku mdog mthing nag/ dbu sum brgya/ phyag drug brgya pa zhig dgod/ shar du
60a5(dza): rdo rje til mar dgod/ lhor stag gi mgo can dgod/ nub tu g.yag gi mgo can dgod/ byang du sbrul gyi mgo can dgod/ de'i phyi ram pad+ma brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum
60a6(dza): la pho nya sum brgya dgod do// 'dab ma brgyad pa gsum la pho nya nyi shu rtsa bzhi dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu la pho nya lnga bcu rtsa brgyad dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu
60a7(dza): la yang sprul gyi pho nya dgod do// de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi la pho nya las byed bzhi dgod do// ci bgyi dang / bka' nyan dang / ba ka'i pho nya dang / sprul pa dang / yang
60b1(dza): sprul dang / 'di rnams yang dag pa'i bden par nges par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las/ rdo rje pha
60b2(dza): nye'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsu
60b3(dza): shing phyung // bdag med gnyis rtogs sgrib pa gnyis sangs pa// thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las//
60b4(dza): 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khwa// gnyis med dga' las 'phrin las snying rjes snyoms// dpal chen khrag 'thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtog 'joms spyad
60b5(dza): pa mthun pas 'gro 'dul zhing // brda can yang dag len pa'i don go la// la rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun+da dang 'brel// bka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par
60b6(dza): 'os/ zhes bya ba'i don to// lung gsum man ngag gsum dang / spyi don gsum lung gi spyi gtsad man ngag gde 'du bya// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi log
60b7(dza): phub la/ bzhi btsam drug ldan rtsis 'gos sa bcad de// khra bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad// 'di ni khrag 'thung rnga ma brjid rgyal po'i lung // zhes tshig nyung zhing
61a1(dza): mdor bsdus la/ don mang por 'byung bas mdo'i sde zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/
61a2(dza): lung gsum gyis sna drangs te gdeng du bya'o/ 1/ man ngag gsum gyis mjug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don no/ 2/ spyi don gsum gyis lus thams cad kyi spyi bcad do/ 2/ spyi khog
61a3(dza): bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbu ba bo// bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba bcom mo// rtsis dgos drug gis sa bcad do// kho bo rtog pa'i mtshan ma'i
61a4(dza): gnyer gyis bshad pas ni gol sa dang sgrib pa spang ngo // yon tan kun rngam pas brjid gzhan la snang ba'i phyir rnga ma brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan to// rgyal po yin pa'i
61a5(dza): rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyis rgyal por mnga' gsol lo// lung gi spyi dril te bshad do// de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas/ da ni phye phyang ngos bstan te gses nas bshad pa/
61a6(dza): de la lung gsum ni/ zhi ga nas ming ni dngos po mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram// gdos bcas don dang bstun te 'tsham par
61a7(dza): bshad/ ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du nges// de la man ngag gsum ni/ bdag tu mi rtog sprul pa mdzod nas thon// yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzod
61b1(dza): du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyings su gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spang man ngag de la spyidon gsum ni/ med rgyu ba rtag
61b2(dza): chags sgrub 'grub bltas par snang // spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dpal sos 'dul// rtog 'joms sman rdzas dngos len grub pa'i rgyu// 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad/
61b3(dza): de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni// gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khro// gang khro rnam pa bzhir ni shes bya ste// ngang khro shugs khro khro bar bcas dang bcos// rtogs pa thugs rje
61b4(dza): rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang // gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa po// las bzhis sgrol mdzad 'bras bu sku gsung thugs// ci phyir
61b5(dza): rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dug gsum mi spong sha rus khrag la rol// gang gis rgyu ni hU~M dang ha ha phaT// gnas ni rta 'og mkha' ste ye shes thugs// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul
61b6(dza): gsum po khro bo'i sku// 'bras bu dpal chen 'phra me na tshogs kyis bskor// 'phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni/ tsham
61b7(dza): ngam drag pos lha chen 'dir 'gyel brdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig/ dus gsum brlag phyir sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes 'chi med rgyal ba'i gnas
62a1(dza): su stobs// rtsis mgo drug ni/ dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang // dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang // ye shes dang ni nan tan dang /
62a2(dza): drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// de la dbang ni/ chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dag ni// mnyes stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sprul// dran med thod pa kham par
62a3(dza): g.yang gzhi ni// kha n+ya rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen gnon// de la dpal drug ni/ byams pas khyab la thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs//
62a4(dza): smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs// gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis grub// yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal he rnam
62a5(dza): drug yin// de la dpal yongs su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba// mkha'
62a6(dza): khyab sbyin brdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun// ting 'dzin bsam yas po des thogs pa des// bsam yas bsam khyab mkha' la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan
62a7(dza): pa/ mang chen gsung sgra dbyangs dang pho nya'i dbang // dug lnga gdos bcas 'du byed rgyan byas pa// khrag sbrul g.yang gzhi kha zla dregs pa 'joms// de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni//
62b1(dza): mi thung bus pa'i gzugs 'dra la// a gon la ni rkang lag gtams// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la// shin tu phra zhing skem bag bri// gnod sbyin snying bag mi thung gzugs dang ni//
62b2(dza): 'du la dbang yi dgas srin po drang srong 'dra// da la grags pa ni/ bud d+ha bo d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs// gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon pa ra grags/ 2/ de la ye
62b3(dza): shes ni rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral// 'khor ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das// gnyis su med pas mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang // mdor
62b4(dza): na thams cad mkhyen pa'i yes shes yin/ 3/ de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du// nan tan 'phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don// bsam yas nan tan
62b5(dza): 'gro ba chud mi gson// nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya// da ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do// de yang mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung dang /
62b6(dza): mchog yon tan gyi lung dang / yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad do// de la mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes pa// bdud
62b7(dza): 'joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung // stag ni dpa' brtul za byed rgyan zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje 'phrin las ngang du bstan// sbrul ni mnyen lcug 'phrin las rgyan zhes pa/
63a1(dza): 'jigs tshul du gnon 'khyil pa yum gyi rgyan// thod 'phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa// sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang 'chad sgrol// g.yang
63a2(dza): gzhi tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa// byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos zhes bya// rag ta thugs rjes chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje spyan//
63a3(dza): gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od// bral ba 'dul byed 'phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog/ me ni
63a4(dza): 'bar 'phro 'dra sreg glog dkyil zhes// ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'du 'phrin las te// zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me sgra sgra chen tha dad sgra zhes pa//
63a5(dza): chos skus khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa// ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ba ni// se nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthing na ga nam mkha'i rgyan zhes pa// 'dul
63a6(dza): dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gting mi dpogs shes bya'o// de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do// de la dpal he ru ka'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan
63a7(dza): cir yang ma nges par 'byung ste/ gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub bo zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang // de las dngos byung phyag rgya rnams// nges
63b1(dza): pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas bsgoms na ci dgar 'grub// ces 'byung ngo // 'o na yang 'di yi ga nas skabs su/ he ru ka dbu gsum
63b2(dza): phyag drug/ zhabs bzhir bgrad de/ de yang yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang gnyis so//
63b3(dza): de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsum thugs lhu na grub// lta spyod rnam ga su ma grub pa'i rtags// spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum
63b4(dza): ye shes gsum ste dgu// bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa// rtag chad spyan gnyis mtha' spangs dbu ma'i spyan// shangs gsum srog la mnga' mdzad ting
63b5(dza): 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang zhes bya// sgra chen tha dad sgra ste chos sku ting 'dzin spyan// zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub/ ljags gsum
63b6(dza): theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags// mche bzhi 'phrin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar phyin phyag drug ste// pha rol phyin drug mthar phyin phyag mtshan
63b7(dza): drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhi bgrod pa med pa thob/ de la mdzad pa rtags shes bya ba ni/ spyan dgus dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag gzigs// spyan gsum srid
64a1(dza): gsum 'gro rgyud so sor mkhyen// shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gas na//
64a2(dza): dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thugs// zhal gsum dbyings su dug gsum zad par rngub// ljags gsum theg gsum ba stan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs//
64a3(dza): khams gsumanyug byed rdo rje srin mo lte// mche bzhis skye bzhi rjud nas gcod par mdzad// phyag drug rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug
64a4(dza): 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhis 'phrin las rnam bzhis bgrod med sgrol// yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang bshad de// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni// rang
64a5(dza): bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos sku rdo rjes rtog dang bag chags sreg/ ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya/ kha nad bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos
64a6(dza): dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes dbyings rtogs zhe na khrag thugs rdzi spyad// mthar gnyis skyon la mi sngags zad pa'i mchog/ kha TA stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa
64a7(dza): ni/ drug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms// stong gsum srid pa yang 'du la rgyal po'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du bsdus// zhing
64b1(dza): chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' 'gro tshim par byed// brdeg pa'i dbyug pas gdon
64b2(dza): bcas phung po bshig/ rtogs pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung // ji ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya// thong gshol thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs tha
64b3(dza): ba thugs rjes bzlog mdzad cing // ye shes chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags// thabs kyi sku gsung lhu na grub sprul pa 'phro// rnga ni shes rab pha ral phyin bstan
64b4(dza): pa/ yul med ma skyes chos sku rdza ko la// 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyug gus brdungs// gsung rab rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab bskyed// 'khor los bsam gtan
64b5(dza): lhag pa gsung gi mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan// pad+ma 'dam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang
64b6(dza): du bstan// mi zad par ldan sbyin pas pha rol phyin// ral gri ye shes thugs rjes mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad//
64b7(dza): dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi brda tsam chos sku rtogs par bstan// de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi
65a1(dza): lung gis spyir dril te bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyis brjid la/ 'phrin las kyi rngom sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni/ de la sku'i stabs mngon
65a2(dza): pa dang bzhi'o// nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgyar rngom// cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngam// zil gyi gnon pa'i gdan bzhi rngo ma// tsham nga ma chen po'i stabs
65a3(dza): rngom pa dang bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la// nam mkha' la sprin dang ba'i tshul dang // lha dang 'phags pa tshangs pa dang / smon lam cir yang
65a4(dza): 'gyur ba'i bzhugs stabs kyi tshul dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri ma med pa pad+ma nyi zla 'od yon tan rtags te gdan khri'i tshul dang / stabs chen bcu'i
65a5(dza): tshul dang / rnam pa ni 'go nas 'chad do// gsung gi rngo ma bzhi la/ hom lnga 'brel par 'byung ba'i zhal rngom zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags rngom/ skye shi'i
65a6(dza): rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems rngom/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrogs pa dbyangs rngom pa'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang duraro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pas
65a7(dza): 'brel sa rnam pa lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbang tshul 'dus byas dang / rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes
65b1(dza): bzhes gcod pa'i tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i mdo sdes go bar sgrogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / rnam par bshad do//
65b2(dza): thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la/ ting 'dzin nam mkha' rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ 'phrin mas rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dba' rlabs lta ra rngo ma/ yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar
65b3(dza): rnga ma mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi gar stabs ltar rngam pa'o// de yang rgyan chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma
65b4(dza): g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin las zhi gnas kyi rgyan khyab par 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong ga rkyen gyis phan
65b5(dza): 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma 'gos pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang 'gyur ba'i dga' ba bskyed pa'i tshul lo// mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la/
65b6(dza): ru tra cos pa'i gnas rngom/ lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngam/ rtog 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/ de yang gnas khyad par can
65b7(dza): bkra shi se shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang / gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / zhing khyad pa ra can khams gsum yongs sgrol ba'i tshul dang /
66a1(dza): spyod pa khyad par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu bcom pa'i tshul lo// rngom tshul sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad do/ de la brjid chen po
66a2(dza): la sku che yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid che/ bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid
66a3(dza): che ba ste bzhi'o// de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che ste/ thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung 'i sgra nas rags/ sems can 'du byed dang mnyam par
66a4(dza): 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang / smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang mthun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso
66a5(dza): bor mthong / rang bzhin grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ 'phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bzhi la/ gdangs chen stong gsum gang ba'i brjid cha/
66a6(dza): tshig myur the tsom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la nyid cher ston pas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che/ de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che//
66a7(dza): sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang / sgra dbyangs sgo nas kun gyis go bas myur/ nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas the tsom gcod/ byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs/
66b1(dza): thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher sto na/ shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs/ tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas kun 'dul/ thugs kyi brjid bzhi la/ yang ba re dogs med
66b2(dza): pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid cha/ thugs rjes thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o// de yang
66b3(dza): gnyis su med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ spang blang med pa'i sgo nas re dog med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu ma ra gsal/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis
66b4(dza): mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa
66b5(dza): sel ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul/ yon tan gyi brji bzhi la/ med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig la 'dod dgur ston pas brjid che/
66b6(dza): gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos pas brjid che'o// de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/
66b7(dza): ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig/ sems kyi sgo nas 'dod dgur ston/ sems can gyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor/ grub pa'i rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad/ shes bya'i
67a1(dza): sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyi mgos pa/ 'phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ mi mnyel nyams phag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor
67a2(dza): bar yun rings mi snyil bas brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun du mdzad pas baN+Did che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o// de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas mi
67a3(dza): dmyal rangs bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol/ don mdzad pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas ma dmyal/ mthu'i sgo nas
67a4(dza): mgon skyabs che/ dam bcas pa'i sgo nas 'gro don rgyun du mdzad/ rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs/ nan tan gyi sgo nas bya ba 'grub/ bar+Na/
67a5(dza): nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste/ spyir drug cu'o// de la rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'khor lo rin po che'i dbang bcus skyes pa bzhi la dbang bskur ro// btsun
67a6(dza): mo rin po ches ni yum gyi rgyal po la mnyes par 'bul lo/ 2/ dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'joms so/ 2/ khyim bdag rin po ches ni tshad med pa bzhis
67a7(dza): rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin to// glang po rin po che'i stobs bcus pha rol bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do// rta mchog rin po che myur mgyogs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod
67b1(dza): pa'i gnas su slob par byed do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi 'dod pa skong ngo // lung rnam pa gsum ni/ mi bzla
67b2(dza): brgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyar bar zad// de la 'khor rin po che'i dbang bcu ni/ skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa// lha mi sdig
67b3(dza): sbrul mche ba bzhi ru ston// yo byad srid pa'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni// rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol// ji ltar mos bzhin tshul dgu gzugs ston pa// gar
67b4(dza): dbang 'thad ka'i tshul du rol pa mdzad// rdzu 'phrul ba spu'i dbyings nas 'phra man 'phro// lus ni cir rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs skad ngar sgrogs
67b5(dza): pa sna tshogs kyis// che ba zil non tha dad chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan spyan gnyis dbu ma'i ngang // dbyings las ma g.yos cir yang sa len mkhyen//
67b6(dza): sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa mdzad// rdo rje sngar mo pags pa spu 'phreng brgyan// 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la
67b7(dza): dbang / lta ba rnam bzhi spyan zur gyis gzigs pas// 'phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon lam dbang gis drag po'i skur ston pa// dus mtha'i
68a1(dza): bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med// de la btsun ma rin po che'i dbang ni/ ma chags rdo rje'i gzungs kyi yum gyis 'khyud// zhi gnas ting 'dzin
68a2(dza): mi g.yo yum gyis sbyar// thogs med shugs 'chang ngan grub yum gyis bskyod// lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis mnyes byed 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste/
68a3(dza): bde ba chen po'i skul mnyes par 'bul// dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgu ni/ sgeg par 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul// nyam nga med pa'i mdzad spyod dpa' ba'i tshul/
68a4(dza): gdug rtsub gdos bcas brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log par lta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i chos grogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' la
68a5(dza): khro nga rje'i tshul// smon lam dbang gis mi shol rngam pa'i tshul// nyon mongs grub pa'i sgyur mdzad da mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo zhi ba'i tshul/ 5de
68a6(dza): la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni/ khro gtum tshad med byams par snang // gsod chen snying rje bdag nyid che// bsgral zhing bstabs pa dga'i ba'i mchog
68a7(dza): yal bar mi 'dod btang snyoms so// de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni/ thugs rje'i stobs ni drags chen bsnyengs phyir ston// chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs nam
68b1(dza): mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun// ma spangs stobs ni gdos bcas sku la brgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i rgyan//
68b2(dza): sman lam stobs ni bskal par yongs sgrol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan 'phra me na 'phro// phrag dag log lta 'khor bar cig mi gtong // 'dod chags yud tsam
68b3(dza): 'phral 'dod spyan bzlog dmar/ de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ chos dbyings med bzhin cir snang la// mkha' la 'ja' tshan bzhin du rnam par
68b4(dza): bkram/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong // tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang
68b5(dza): mnyam pa'i sprin phung bzhin du brdal// sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// ro gcig char 'bab snod kyis bye brag phye/ de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni//
68b6(dza): 'gro rnams ji ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skang // mi zad bdag med gter tshan nam mkha'i mdog/ srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron// dus gsum rgyun mi
68b7(dza): 'chad pa'i rin chen 'phreng // lung gsum ni rtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no// da ni lha rgyud kyi rtog pa so sor bshad par bya ste/ 'gro rnams ji ltar
69a1(dza): 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab nam mkha'i bskal pas dga' dgur ston// gti mug tshul gyis gti mug 'joms mdzad pa/
69a2(dza): gti mug rdo rje bud d+ha he ru ka/ ye shes thugs rjes nyan mongs rdo rje 'joms// thabs 'dzin mtshan cha'i bskal pas dngos po bshegs// zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang
69a3(dza): 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka/ rin chen dbyig star kun gyi re rgong zhing // bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru// nga rgyal tshul gyis ngargyam
69a4(dza): 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rat+na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du pad ltar sku 'khrungs shing // lhag mthong ma chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg/ 'dod chags
69a5(dza): tshul gyis 'dod chags 'joms mdzad pa// 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka/ 'phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung
69a6(dza): gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje karma he ru ka/ sku yi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // shes rab mthar phyin
69a7(dza): gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // ches dbyings nam mkha'i dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// thugs kyi longs spyod sna tshogs mi
69b1(dza): dmigs shing // brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // sra brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal//
69b2(dza): gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // tshul khrims mthar phyi ni 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // lhag
69b3(dza): mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // sbyin pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ngar 'dzin bro mchog mchod/
69b4(dza): pas mnyes mdzad cing // bdag med zhi gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// 'phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // bzod pas mthar phyin phrag dag
69b5(dza): rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // thogs med las la dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i tshogs//
69b6(dza): 'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug to can// dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs ke'u rim// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud
69b7(dza): rkun mo'i tshogs// mthu 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tse'u rim// gsung gos
70a1(dza): thams cad zil gnon rmongs ma'i tshogs// dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi spong chu srin can// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta// stong
70a2(dza): gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo ha// thal bar byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs// kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje rtse dgu 'dzin// sa dgu rtog 'joms shi ba slong bar gzigs//
70a3(dza): 'jig rten thal byed sde'u thogs pa ta li// 'byed med shes rab mi rtog spos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang 'dren las// khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun
70a4(dza): gyis thugs rjes sgrol// bde mchog dbyings su 'dren mdzad pu ka si// zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum mo'i tshogs// myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i//
70a5(dza): thugs rjes bkug cing ra za'i tshul du gzigs// snod bcu da dkrugs nas skongs mdzad kas ma ri// chags cha'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha ni// ma ning rgyud 'phral gzung 'dzin /
70a6(dza): bral ba'i rtags// mtha' gnyis spangs pas rnam par g.yengs tshul gzigs// 'bar ma stong gsum stobs byed tsan d+ha li// thams cad 'byung ba'i yum gyur ma tshogs ma//
70a7(dza): kun gyi las mdzad chos sku snying po 'dzin// kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan// thugs rjes 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni// 'joms byed rtsal mchog rdo rje thugs kyi
70b1(dza): yu ma/ gnyen po stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis gnon// shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don// sdug bsngal zhe sdang gsod mdzad sing ha ma// dpa' brtul za
70b2(dza): byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du// thugs rje ye shes rtsa gcig so sor gzigs// nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad byA g+h+ri ma//
70b3(dza): mdzes byed dam tshig rnam dag gsum gyi yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos sku ting 'dzin ljags la ba sta ra// 'dod chags dur khrod 'joms
70b4(dza): mdzad sri ka ma// mi 'byed spyod pas mchog rnams rigs kyi yum// g.yer ba'i 'phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srungs// chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis gzigs// phrag dog
70b5(dza): las grub za byed shA na ma// yid kyi ye shes so sor kun la rtog/ rnam shes kyis bas dgod 'brang tshul khrims srung // 'khor ba'i rgyud gcod rgyu 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin// mgyogs
70b6(dza): mas snyag byed khrag 'thung kri ta ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'grogs mtshan ma 'joms// bsad pa'i god rnams bzhin pas pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das chos sku gzung 'dzin spang
70b7(dza): tshul gzung // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha 'phrog kang ka ma// bslad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing // mi mthun gnyen pos mi shigs bzod pa'i mchog/ chos sku thugs su
71a1(dza): chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kang ka ma// dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha
71a2(dza): rol phyin// dbyings kyi thugs rjes 'phrin las 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rnga ma tshul u lu ka/ bcu drug zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dpal chen bcu
71a3(dza): drug sa la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i sku// thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med// sbyin pas rig pa'i rlung du 'tsho 'drang ltar// 'khor ba'i
71a4(dza): 'dzings nas thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'dren// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don mdzad pa// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// don dam mthun pas kun kyang dga' bar
71a5(dza): mdzad/ byams pa'i zhags pas 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing // rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong // yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don
71a6(dza): du spyad pas bdag gi don// shes rab sgrol mas mun pa'i sdug bsngal sel// don nyid mi 'da' lhun grub dga' ba'i mchog/ kun mnyes ma reg nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan// snyan pas
71a7(dza): smra bas kun kyang de bzhin byed// btang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du// phab nas rnam shes thal ba'i gzungs kyang 'tsho// chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril
71b1(dza): 'khrol ma// da ni srin po'i rgyud bshad de/ bco brgyad spyan gyis bco brgyad khams la gzigs// bco brgya shangs nas bco brgyad sprul pa 'byung // bco brgyad
71b2(dza): khams la bco brgyad skur ston cing // bco brgyad thugs kyis bco brgyad gdul thabs mnga'// bco brgyad snyan gyis bco brgyad khams gsan cing // ba co brgyad ljags kyis gsung rab
71b3(dza): bco brgyad 'chad// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgu ldan// brjid gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon// ji
71b4(dza): ltar rol yang spyan dgur dbyings mi g.yo// 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing // rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs// rnam thar gsum las sku gsum 'phrin las
71b5(dza): 'byung / spyad pas rnam dag smon lam stobs kyis gshegs// ral gsogs sprul pas 'gro don rtse gcig rol// bco brgyad stong las mnyes mdzad tsit+ta ma// brjid pa'i stabs
71b6(dza): kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing // phra ma'i skyo na spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// chos la dbang mdzad ha ya grI ba dpal// ljon tshul
71b7(dza): stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing // log lha'i nyes spangs yang dag lha dang ldan// chos khrims mthar phyin drang srong spyod pas che// skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon//
72a1(dza): shugs 'chang stabs kyis rlung ltar tshar gcod cing // 'khyal pa'i spyod spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'dod pa kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i rgyal// sems
72a2(dza): la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal// 'tsher ba'i stabs kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan// ngag rtsub skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// smon lam mthar phyin bdud 'dul
72a3(dza): thugs rje'i rtsi// las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kun Da li// gnod pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing // gnod sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// gnyan po'i
72a4(dza): stobs kyi mi mthun gnon mdzad cing // rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// rdeg pa'i stabs kyis srin mtshar gcod cing // bden dang bral ba'i rdzun spangs skyon sel
72a5(dza): ba/ mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad pa// ye shes dbang mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can// 'degs pa'i stabs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing // brnab sems skyon
72a6(dza): spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// bzod pa sa gzhi lta bu ra bzhin 'gyur la// smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes kun da li// bzlog pa'i stabs kyi bdud 'dul tshar gcod cing //
72a7(dza): 'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// ye shes mthar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal// skye bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad hUM ka ra// rol pa'i stabs kyis lha rnams tshar
72b1(dza): gcod cing // ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che// rab tu shes pa'i ye shes rab mthar phyin// yo byad dab pa mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal// 'jigs byed stabs kyis/
72b2(dza): 'chi ba dag zil gnon cing // srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan ngang la gnas// tshe la dbang mdzad 'jig byed gshin rje gshed//
72b3(dza): ye shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching // ye shes thugs rjes zin pas srid pa grol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar snyems// 'dod pa'i rgyal po ma nyes mdzad seng
72b4(dza): ge dang / rig pa'i sder mo chos kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin// thugs rje'i lcags kyus 'khor ba mi gtong zhing // shes rab thabs kyi lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin// gtso bo
